Steam (ST): When I started my journey to expose the past of 12 years ago, my goal had been abstract, and I hadn't understood.
Umineko Project (UP): When I started my final journey to expose the past of twelve years ago, its goal had been abstract, and I hadn't understood.
PC Japanese (JP): １２年前を暴く私の最後の旅は、初めはその目的も抽象的で、わからなかった。
Russian (RU): Когда я начала своё путешествие, стремясь раскрыть прошлое 12 лет назад, моя цель была слишком абстрактной, и я не понимала, что именно делаю.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando comecei minha jornada final para expor o passado de doze anos atrás, eu tinha um objeto abstrato, e ainda não tinha compreensão sobre ele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 為揭開十二年前真相的，我的最後之旅，起初其目的既是抽象的，也是我所理解不了的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 为揭开十二年前真相的，我的最后之旅，起初其目的既是抽象的，也是我所理解不了的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando ho iniziato il mio viaggio per rivelare il passato di 12 anni fa, quell'obiettivo era astratto, e io non avevo capito.

Steam (ST): But now, ...I have no doubts.
Umineko Project (UP): But now, ......I have no doubts.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、……今は私は、疑わない。
Russian (RU): Но теперь у меня не осталось сомнений.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas agora, ......não me restam mais dúvidas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，……現在的我毫不懷疑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，……现在的我毫不怀疑。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma ora... non ho dubbi.

Steam (ST): This journey...was induced by several thoughts and fates over 12 years.
Umineko Project (UP): This journey............was induced by all kinds of thoughts and fates over twelve years.
PC Japanese (JP): この旅は、…………１２年を経て、様々な思いや運命によって誘われたもの。
Russian (RU): На это путешествие... меня подвигли несколько мыслей и судеб на протяжении 12 лет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esta jornada............foi induzida por todos os tipos de pensamentos e destinos por doze anos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這趟旅程，…………是經過了十二年，由種種想法與命運所引領的產物。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这趟旅程，…………是经过了十二年，由种种想法与命运所引领的产物。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questo viaggio... è stato indotto da diversi pensieri e destini per oltre 12 anni.

Steam (ST): A journey to reach an end for me, Ushiromiya Ange.
Umineko Project (UP): A journey to end things...for me, Ushiromiya Ange.
PC Japanese (JP): 私、右代宮縁寿にとっての、終わらせる旅。
Russian (RU): Путешествие, чтобы определиться с собой, Уширомией Энджи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma jornada para terminar as coisas...para mim, Ushiromiya Ange.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 是對於我、右代宮緣壽的，終結之旅。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 是对于我、右代宫缘寿的，终结之旅。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Un viaggio per terminare le cose per me, Ushiromiya Ange.

Steam (ST): And, a journey reach an end as the last witch of Mariage Sorcière.
Umineko Project (UP): And a journey to end things...as the final witch of Mariage Sorcière.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、マリアージュ・ソルシエールの最後の魔女としての、終わらせる旅。
Russian (RU): И путешествие, чтобы покончить с этим как последняя ведьма Меридж Сорсьер.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E uma jornada para terminar as coisas...como última bruxa da Mariage Sorcière.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 是我作為 Mariage Sorcière 的最後的魔女的，終結之旅。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 是我作为 Mariage Sorcière 的最后的魔女的，终结之旅。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E un viaggio per porre fine a questo come ultima strega del Mariage Sorcière.

Steam (ST): I came here as the last daughter of the Ushiromiya family... and as the last witch...
Umineko Project (UP): I came here as the final daughter of the Ushiromiya family, and as the final witch......
PC Japanese (JP): 私は右代宮家の最後の娘として、そして、最後の魔女として、ここへやって来た……。
Russian (RU): Я пришла сюда как последняя дочь семьи Уширомия и как последняя ведьма...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu vim aqui como última filha da família Ushiromiya, e como última bruxa......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我是作為右代宮家的最後的女兒，以及最後的魔女，而來到此處的……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我是作为右代宫家的最后的女儿，以及最后的魔女，而来到此处的……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sono venuta qui come ultima figlia della famiglia Ushiromiya, e come ultima strega...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "...Dad, Mom, Onii-chan. ...Sorry. Let me greet Maria onee-chan first."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Mom, Dad, Onii‐chan. ...Sorry. Let me greet Maria onee‐chan first."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……お父さん、お母さん、お兄ちゃん。…ごめんね。先に、真里亞お姉ちゃんとの挨拶をさせてね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……お父さん、お母さん、お兄ちゃん。…ごめんね。先に、真里亞お姉ちゃんとの挨拶をさせてね」
Russian (RU): ".....Папа, мама, братик. ...Простите. Позвольте мне сперва поприветствовать Марию онее‐чан."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Mãe, pai, onii‐chan. ...Desculpa. Deixem‐me cumprimentar a Maria onee‐chan primeiro."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……爸爸、媽媽、哥哥。…對不起。請允許我，先與真里亞姐姐聊聊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……爸爸、妈妈、哥哥。…对不起。请允许我，先与真里亚姐姐聊聊。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Papà, Mamma, Onii-chan. ... Scusate. Lasciatemi salutare Maria Onee-chan per prima."

Steam (ST): A strong tailwind urged me on.
Umineko Project (UP): A strong gust of wind from behind urged me on.
PC Japanese (JP): 強い追い風が相槌を打つ。
Russian (RU): Усилившийся ветер подстегнул меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma forte rajada de vento soprou pelas minhas costas, incitando‐me.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 強勁的順風給出了回答。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 强劲的顺风给出了回答。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Un forte vento mi sollecitò.

Steam (ST): That tailwind took just my soul out from inside my body...to the vast forest beneath me.
Umineko Project (UP): That gust took just my soul out from inside my body, ......to the vast forest beneath me.
PC Japanese (JP): その追い風が、私の体の中から魂だけを抜き出して、……眼下の広大な森林へ。
Russian (RU): Он вынул мою душу из тела и понёс в широкий лес подо мной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Essa rajada simplesmente tirou minha alma de meu corpo, ......na direção da vasta floresta abaixo de mim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這股順風，帶走了我體內的靈魂，……去了下方的廣大森林。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这股顺风，带走了我体内的灵魂，……去了下方的广大森林。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quel forte vento che proveniva da dietro portò la mia anima da dentro il mio corpo... fino alla vasta foresta sotto di me.

Steam (ST): And, though from here on I couldn't see, I believed that it flew me to the mansion on that day, to where everyone was, ...to where Maria onee-chan was.
Umineko Project (UP): And, though I couldn't see it from where I stood, I believed that it would fly me to the mansion on that day, to where everyone was...to where Maria onee‐chan was.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてここからは見えないけれど、あの日のお屋敷へ、みんなへ、真里亞お姉ちゃんのもとへ飛ばしてくれると信じる。
Russian (RU): И, хоть начиная отсюда я не могла того видеть, я поверила, что он нёс меня в особняк тех дней, где находились все, включая Марию онее‐чан.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E, embora eu não pudesse ver de onde estava, eu acreditei que ele me faria voar até a mansão daquele dia, para onde todos estavam...para onde a Maria onee‐chan estava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然從這裡看不見，但我相信，它會帶著我的靈魂，飛往那一天的大屋，飛往大家的身邊、真里亞姐姐的身邊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然从这里看不见，但我相信，它会带着我的灵魂，飞往那一天的大屋，飞往大家的身边、真里亚姐姐的身边。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E, nonostante da lì non potessi vedere, credetti che mi facesse volare alla villa di quel giorno, dove c'erano tutti... dove c'era Maria Onee-chan.

Steam (ST): And so, ...even though my body was on the top of a hill, a strong wind blowing against me, ...my soul was now certainly dancing through that sky...
Umineko Project (UP): And so, ......even though my body was on the top of the hill, a strong wind blowing against me, .........my soul was now certainly dancing through that sky......
PC Japanese (JP): だから私は、……体は丘の上にいて強い風に吹かれながらも、………魂は今、確かに、その空を舞っていた……。
Russian (RU): И так, в то время, как моё тело находилось на вершине холма, обдуваемое сильным ветром, душа моя определённо танцевала в небе...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E então, ......mesmo com meu corpo estando no topo da colina, com um forte vento soprando contra mim, .........minha alma estava agora, certamente, dançando pelo céu......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，儘管我的肉體，……是在山丘上，受著強風吹拂，………但靈魂卻于此刻，的的確確飛舞在空中……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，尽管我的肉体，……是在山丘上，受着强风吹拂，………但灵魂却于此刻，的的确确飞舞在空中……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E perciò... nonostante il mio corpo fosse in cima alla collina, un forte vento soffiò contro di me... e la mia anima ora stava certamente danzando nel cielo...

Steam (ST): The vast, vast sky of Rokkenjima. ...Below me was the green of many trees.
Umineko Project (UP): The vast, vast sky of Rokkenjima.{n}......Below me was the green of many trees.
PC Japanese (JP): それはとてもとても広大な六軒島の空。………眼下にいっぱいの木々の緑。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それはとてもとても広大な六軒島の空。{n}………眼下にいっぱいの木々の緑。
Russian (RU): Широкое, обширное небо Роккенджимы.{n}......Деревья, зеленеющие внизу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O vasto céu de Rokkenjima.{n}......Abaixo de mim, um vasto tapete de árvores verdes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那是非常非常廣闊的六軒島的天空。{n}………身下是一大片樹木之綠。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那是非常非常广阔的六轩岛的天空。{n}………身下是一大片树木之绿。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il vasto, vasto cielo di Rokkenjima. ... Sotto di me c'era il verde di molti alberi.

Steam (ST): But...I understand. I can comprehend the presences of my family and relatives...and all the servants. ......And...Maria onee-chan too.
Umineko Project (UP): But...I can tell. I can comprehend the presences of my family and relatives, and all the servants. .........And...Maria onee‐chan too.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、わかる。家族や親族、使用人のみんなの気配を、理解できる。………そして、真里亞お姉ちゃんも。
Russian (RU): Но я понимаю. Я способна воспринять присутствие моей семьи, родственников, всех слуг.........И Марии онее‐чан.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas...eu podia afirmar. Eu podia compreender a presença da minha família, dos meus parentes, de todos os serviçais. .........E...da Maria onee‐chan também.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，明白。我能夠理解，諸位家人、親人、傭人。………以及，真里亞姐姐的氣息。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，明白。我能够理解，诸位家人、亲人、佣人。………以及，真里亚姐姐的气息。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma... io capivo. Io posso comprendere le presenze della mia famiglia e dei parenti, e di tutti i domestici. ... E... anche Maria Onee-chan.

Steam (ST): I could even comprehend...Maria onee-chan as a witch.
Umineko Project (UP): I could even comprehend......Maria onee‐chan as a witch.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔女としての真里亞お姉ちゃんも、……理解できる。
Russian (RU): Я даже могла ощущать её как ведьму.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu podia até mesmo compreender......a Maria onee‐chan como uma bruxa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 能夠理解，身為魔女的，……真里亞姐姐。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 能够理解，身为魔女的，……真里亚姐姐。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Potevo persino comprendere... Maria Onee-chan come strega.

Steam (ST): It was vast, more so than any vast space I had imagined up until now.
Umineko Project (UP): It was vast, more vast than any space I had imagined up until now.
PC Japanese (JP): それは私が今までイメージしてきた、どんな広大な空間よりも、広大なもの。
Russian (RU): Оно было широчайшим, даже шире, чем обширное пространство, которое я представляла до сего момента.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era vasto, muito mais vasto do que qualquer espaço que eu havia imaginado até agora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 它比我之前描繪過的任何廣大空間，都要廣闊無邊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 它比我之前描绘过的任何广大空间，都要广阔无边。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era vasto, più di qualunque spazio vasto che avessi immaginato fino ad ora.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "......Maria onee-chan, can you hear me...? Listen...!!"
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Maria onee‐chan. Can you hear me......? Listen......!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………真里亞お姉ちゃん。聞こえる……？　聞いて……！！」
Russian (RU): "........Мария онее‐чан. Ты меня слышишь? Слушай!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Maria onee‐chan. Consegue me ouvir......? Ouça......!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………真里亞姐姐。聽得到嗎……？請聽我說……！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………真里亚姐姐。听得到吗……？请听我说……！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Maria Onee-chan. Puoi sentirmi...? Ascolta...!!"

Steam (ST): Ange called to the Maria of that day.
Umineko Project (UP): Ange shouted to the Maria of that day.
PC Japanese (JP): 縁寿はあの日の真里亞に叫ぶ。
Russian (RU): Энджи позвала Марию того дня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ange gritou para a Maria daquele dia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 緣壽在向那一天的真里亞呼喊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 缘寿在向那一天的真里亚呼喊。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ange chiamò la Maria di quel giorno.

Steam (ST): She told her of the long journey she'd undergone.
Umineko Project (UP): That she had been through a long journey.
PC Japanese (JP): 長い旅を経たこと。
Russian (RU): Длинное путешествие близилось к концу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Que ela estava em uma longa jornada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 歷經了漫長的旅途。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 历经了漫长的旅途。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Un lungo viaggio era passato.

Steam (ST): Of her long-delayed realization of just how much she'd wounded Maria in her youth.
Umineko Project (UP): And that she had learned just how much she had wounded Maria on that day when she was young.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてようやく、あの幼い日に彼女を、どれだけ傷つけたかを知ったこと。
Russian (RU): И теперь она, наконец, осознала, как глубоко ранила Марию в детстве.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E que havia aprendido o quanto machucou Maria naquele dia quando era jovem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，總算是明白了，自己在年幼時的那一天，給她造成了多大的傷害。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，总算是明白了，自己在年幼时的那一天，给她造成了多大的伤害。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E finalmente, lei capì quanto aveva ferito Maria quando era giovane.

Steam (ST): She understood magic...and now understood everything about the world Maria had wanted to show her.
Umineko Project (UP): Having understood magic, I now understand everything about the world Maria wanted to show me.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔法を理解し、今なら真里亞が見せたかった世界が全てわかる。
Russian (RU): Она познала магию и теперь поняла всё о мире, который Мария хотела показать ей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tendo entendido a magia, agora eu entendo tudo sobre o mundo que ela queria me mostrar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 理解了魔法的我，在現在完全理解了，真里亞姐姐想展示給我看的世界。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 理解了魔法的我，在现在完全理解了，真里亚姐姐想展示给我看的世界。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Capì la magia, e capì ogni cosa del mondo che Maria voleva mostrarle.

Steam (ST): It was very warm, overflowing with love and happiness.
Umineko Project (UP): It is so warm, and overflowing with kindness and happiness.
PC Japanese (JP): それはとても温かくて、慈しみと幸せに溢れていて。
Russian (RU): Он был полон тепла, любви и счастья.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era tão quente, e transbordava com afeição e felicidade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那是個非常溫暖的，洋溢著慈愛與幸福的世界。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那是个非常温暖的，洋溢着慈爱与幸福的世界。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era molto caldo, traboccante d'amore e di felicità.

Steam (ST): ...She wanted to become even happier by sharing that world, but I trampled it.
Umineko Project (UP): ......She had wanted to become even happier by sharing that world, but I had trampled it.
PC Japanese (JP): ……そんな世界を共有することで、もっと幸せになりたかった彼女の気持ちを、なのに私は、踏み躙った。
Russian (RU): И Мария хотела стать ещё счастливей, поделившись этим миром, тогда как я вытерла об него ноги.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ela queria ficar ainda mais feliz compartilhando esse mundo comigo, mas eu simplesmente o pisoteei.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……可是，我卻把這份，想通過共享這個世界，來讓大家一起變得更幸福的，她的心意，踐踏在了腳下。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……可是，我却把这份，想通过共享这个世界，来让大家一起变得更幸福的，她的心意，践踏在了脚下。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Lei aveva voluto che diventasse ancora più felice condividendo questo mondo, ma io lo avevo calpestato.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "So now, I finally understand everything. ......I understand magic...! Our magic is surely very faint and fills the space beside us. ...But it isn't something that anyone can see with their eyes. ......Magic is... ...yes, I can say it clearly."
Umineko Project (UP): "So now, I finally understand everything. ......I understand...magic...! Our magic is surely a very humble thing that exists all around us. ......But it isn't something that just anyone can see with their eyes. ............Magic is......yes, I can say it clearly."
PC Japanese (JP): 「だから私、今こそ全部理解したの。………魔法を、理解した…！　私たちの魔法はきっと、とてもささやかで身近に溢れてる。……でも、それは誰の目にも見えるものではないのよ。……………魔法とは。……えぇ、はっきり言えるわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「だから私、今こそ全部理解したの。……魔法を、理解した…！　私たちの魔法はきっと、とてもささやかで身近に溢れてる。……でも、それは誰の目にも見えるものではないのよ。…………魔法とは。……えぇ、はっきり言えるわ」
Russian (RU): "Поэтому теперь я наконец‐то всё поняла. .......Я понимаю магию! Наша магия и правда очень слаба и заполняет пространство рядом с нами. .....Но она не является чем‐то, что каждый может увидеть своими глазами. ............Магия — это... да, теперь я могу чётко и ясно это сказать."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Por isso, agora, eu finalmente consigo entender. ......Eu entendo...a magia...! Nossa magia é algo muito fino que preenche o espaço ao nosso redor. ......Mas não é algo que qualquer um possa ver com seus olhos. ............Magia é......sim, eu posso dizer claramente."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「所以我，於此刻全部理解了。………理解了，魔法…！我們的魔法，一定非常微小，遍佈在我們身邊。……只不過，這並非是每個人都看得到的東西。……………所謂魔法。……嗯，斬釘截鐵地說好了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「所以我，于此刻全部理解了。………理解了，魔法…！我们的魔法，一定非常微小，遍布在我们身边。……只不过，这并非是每个人都看得到的东西。……………所谓魔法。……嗯，斩钉截铁地说好了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Perciò ora, ho finalmente capito tutto. ... Io capisco la magia...! La nostra magia è sicuramente molto debole e riempie lo spazio oltre noi. ... Ma non è qualcosa che si può vedere con gli occhi. ... La magia è... sì, posso dirlo chiaramente."

Steam (ST): ——Without love, it cannot be "seen".
Umineko Project (UP): {m:-5:—}—Without love, it cannot be {y:1:‘seen’}{n:1:seen}.
PC Japanese (JP): ——愛がなければ、視えない
Russian (RU): ――Её не {y:1:‘узреть’}{n:1:узреть} без любви.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {m:-5:—}—Sem amor, ela não pode ser {y:1:‘vista’}{n:1:vista}.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ——沒有愛，就看不到。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ——没有爱，就看不到。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ――Senza amore, non può essere vista

Steam (ST): Sorry, Onee-chan.
Umineko Project (UP): I'm sorry, Onee‐chan.
PC Japanese (JP): ごめんね、お姉ちゃん。
Russian (RU): Прости, сестричка.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Desculpa, onee‐chan.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對不起，姐姐。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对不起，姐姐。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Scusa, Onee-chan.

Steam (ST): ...I've already been excommunicated from the alliance of witches, but now, I understand how wonderful it is.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I've already been excommunicated from the witches' alliance, but...{n}...after all this time, I now understand how wonderful it is.
PC Japanese (JP): ……もう私は魔女同盟を破門になった身だけれど。今になって、その素晴らしさを理解してる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……もう私は魔女同盟を破門になった身だけれど。{n}今になって、その素晴らしさを理解してる。
Russian (RU): .....Меня изгнали из альянса ведьм, но теперь я осознала,{n}насколько он замечателен.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu já fui excomungada da aliança das bruxas, mas...{n}...depois de todo esse tempo, agora eu entendo como ela é maravilhosa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……雖然，我已被逐出了魔女同盟，{n}但到了現在，我理解到它的美妙了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……虽然，我已被逐出了魔女同盟，{n}但到了现在，我理解到它的美妙了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Io sono già stata scomunicata dall'alleanza delle streghe, ma ora, io comprendo quanto sia meravigliosa.

Steam (ST): And......I know that, after the day I wounded you, Mariage Sorcière... was transfigured into something different from what you truly desired.
Umineko Project (UP): And.........I know that after that day I wounded you, Mariage Sorcière was......transfigured into something different from what you truly desired.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、………私が傷つけてしまったあの日から、マリアージュ・ソルシエールが、……お姉ちゃんが本当の意味で望んでいたものとは違うものに変貌してしまったことを知っている。
Russian (RU): И... я также знаю, что с того дня, как я ранила тебя, Меридж Сорсьер... преобразился в нечто отличное от того, что ты хотела, сестричка.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E.........eu sei que depois daquele dia em que eu machuquei você, a Mariage Sorcière foi......transfigurada em algo diferente daquilo que você realmente desejava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 並且，………我還清楚，自從我傷害了她的那一天起，Mariage Sorcière，……變成了，跟姐姐的真正意願大不相同的同盟。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 并且，………我还清楚，自从我伤害了她的那一天起，Mariage Sorcière，……变成了，跟姐姐的真正意愿大不相同的同盟。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E... so che dal giorno in cui ti ho ferito, il Mariage Sorcière... è diventato qualcosa di diverso da ciò che desideravi veramente, Onee-chan.

Steam (ST): ......Even the magic that spat anger by cursing people was probably important to Onee-chan in those days.
Umineko Project (UP): .........Back in those days, even magic that allowed you to vent your anger by cursing people was probably important to you.
PC Japanese (JP): ………あの日々のお姉ちゃんには、人を呪うことで怒りを吐き出す魔法も、大切だったかもしれない。
Russian (RU): .........Даже магия, плюющаяся злобой и проклинающая людей, наверняка была важна сестричке в те дни.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Voltando naqueles dias, mesmo a magia que permitia a você desabafar sua fúria, amaldiçoando pessoas, provavelmente era importante para você.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………對生活在那段日子裡的姐姐來說，也許就連通過詛咒他人，來發泄憤怒的魔法，都是很重要的吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………对生活在那段日子里的姐姐来说，也许就连通过诅咒他人，来发泄愤怒的魔法，都是很重要的吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Anche la magia che diffondeva rabbia maledicendo le persone probabilmente è stata importante per Onee-chan in quei giorni.

Steam (ST): Onee-chan's environment was sad enough to permit that.
Umineko Project (UP): Your environment was unhappy enough for you to be allowed that.
PC Japanese (JP): お姉ちゃんの境遇は、それが許されるだけの悲しいものだった。
Russian (RU): Окружающая её среда была достаточно печальной и горькой, чтобы дозволить это.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O ambiente ao seu redor era infeliz o suficiente para permitir isso a você.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 姐姐的境遇可悲到了，老天都容許她這麼做。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 姐姐的境遇可悲到了，老天都容许她这么做。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'ambiente di Onee-chan era sufficientemente triste da permetterlo.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "But now, ......those sad days...are over. ......So, ...let's return Onee-chan's alliance of witches... ...back to the original Mariage Sorcière."
Umineko Project (UP): "But.........now, those unhappy days...are over. ......So, ......let's return your witches' alliance............back to the original, gentle Mariage Sorcière."
PC Japanese (JP): 「でも。………もう、そんな悲しい日々は、終わったよ。……だから、……お姉ちゃんの魔女同盟を、………元の、やさしいマリアージュ・ソルシエールに、戻そう。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「でも。………もう、そんな悲しい日々は、終わったよ。……だから、……お姉ちゃんの魔女同盟を、………元の、やさしいマリアージュ・ソルシエールに、戻そう」
Russian (RU): "Но теперь... эти дни... окончены. ......Итак, давайте преобразим альянс ведьм онее‐чан обратно в оригинальный Меридж Сорьсер."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mas.........agora, aqueles dias infelizes...terminaram. ......Por isso, ......vamos retomar sua aliança das bruxas............voltar à original e gentil Mariage Sorcière."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不過。………那段悲慘的日子，已經結束了。……所以，……來將姐姐的魔女同盟，………變回祥和的 Mariage Sorcière 吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不过。………那段悲惨的日子，已经结束了。……所以，……来将姐姐的魔女同盟，………变回祥和的 Mariage Sorcière 吧。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ma... ora, quei giorni tristi... sono finiti. ... Quindi... ritorniamo all'alleanza delle streghe di Onee-chan... all'originale Mariage Sorcière."

Steam (ST): The grimoire was in my hands before I realized it.
Umineko Project (UP): The grimoire was in my hands without me realizing it.
PC Japanese (JP): いつの間にか手に持っていた魔導書。
Russian (RU): Я сама не поняла, как в моих руках оказался гримуар.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sem que eu percebesse, o grimório estava em minhas mãos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在不知不覺間，手上拿著的魔導書。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在不知不觉间，手上拿着的魔导书。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il grimorio fu nelle mie mani senza che me ne accorgessi.

Steam (ST): ...The strong winds were rapidly blowing its pages one after another...
Umineko Project (UP): ......The strong winds were rapidly blowing its pages one after another......
PC Japanese (JP): ……それが強い風で次々と素早くページが捲られていく……。
Russian (RU): Сильный ветер стремительно переворачивал одну страницу за другой...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Os fortes ventos rapidamente viraram as páginas, uma após a outra......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……隨著強風，飛快地翻起了書頁……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……随着强风，飞快地翻起了书页……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... I forti vendi stavano rapidamente sfogliando le sue pagine una dopo l'altra...

Steam (ST): That world had been kind in the beginning.
Umineko Project (UP): It had been a kind world at first.
PC Japanese (JP): 最初はやさしい世界だった。
Russian (RU): Мир изначально был добрым.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O mundo era gentil no início.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 最開始是溫柔祥和的世界。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 最开始是温柔祥和的世界。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il mondo doveva essere gentile all'inizio.

Steam (ST): How could you give birth to magic that would make candy fall from the sky?
Umineko Project (UP): What to do to create magic so that candy rains from the sky.
PC Japanese (JP): どうやったら、空からお菓子が降ってくる魔法が生まれるか。
Russian (RU): Как можно породить магию, заставляющую конфеты сыпаться с неба?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como conceber uma magia que faça chover doces do céu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 怎麼做，才能創造出從天上掉下糖果的魔法呀？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 怎么做，才能创造出从天上掉下糖果的魔法呀？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come si può dare vita ad una magia che fa cadere caramelle dal cielo?

Steam (ST): How could you give birth to magic that would make tomorrow's dinner creme croquette?
Umineko Project (UP): What to do to create magic so that tomorrow's dinner becomes cream croquettes.
PC Japanese (JP): どうやったら、明日の晩御飯がクリームコロッケになる魔法が生まれるか。
Russian (RU): Как можно породить магию, благодаря которой завтра на обед будет крокет со сливками?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como conceber a uma magia que faça com que o jantar de amanhã seja croquete de creme.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 怎麼做，才能創造出讓明天的晚飯變成奶油肉餅的魔法呀？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 怎么做，才能创造出让明天的晚饭变成奶油肉饼的魔法呀？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come si può dare vita ad una magia che rende la cena di domani crocchette alla crema?

Steam (ST): How could you give birth to magic that would make the weather good when you went out the next day, making your whole day fun?
Umineko Project (UP): What to do to create magic so that tomorrow's weather is good when you go out, and you have a fun day.
PC Japanese (JP): どうやったら、明日のお出掛けがお天気になって、楽しい一日になる魔法が生まれるか。
Russian (RU): Как можно породить магию, которая завтра устроит хорошую погоду, чтобы можно было веселиться весь день?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como conceber a uma magia que faça com que o tempo fique bom quando sair, e você tenha um dia divertido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 怎麼做，才能創造出使明天出門時，一整天都是好天氣，度過愉快的一天的魔法呀？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 怎么做，才能创造出使明天出门时，一整天都是好天气，度过愉快的一天的魔法呀？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come si può dare vita ad una magia che fa diventare bel tempo quando esci il giorno dopo, e rendere divertente la tua intera giornata?

Steam (ST): New spells of happiness were created one after another, coloring her world with kindness...
Umineko Project (UP): New magics of happiness were created one after another, coloring her world with kindness...
PC Japanese (JP): 新しい幸せな魔法が次々に生まれて、彼女の世界をやさしく彩っていった…。
Russian (RU): Новые счастливые магии создавались одна за другой, раскрашивая её мир добротой...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Novas magias de felicidade foram sendo criadas uma após a outra, colorindo o mundo com bondade...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一個接一個地被創造出來的，新的幸福的魔法，不斷地給她的世界添上祥和的色彩…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一个接一个地被创造出来的，新的幸福的魔法，不断地给她的世界添上祥和的色彩…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nuove magie di felicità furono create una dopo l'altra, colorando il suo mondo di gentilezza...

Steam (ST): Those days were flipped through one after another, ......and months began to flash by...
Umineko Project (UP): Those days were flipped through one after another, .........and the days and months began to flash by like memories...
PC Japanese (JP): そんな日々が次々に捲られていき、………どんどんと月日が、走馬灯のように駆け巡っていく…。
Russian (RU): И эти дни прошли один за другим, перелистываясь книжными страницами, а затем начал мелькать завтрашний день...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aqueles dias passaram um após o outro pelas páginas, .........e os dias e meses começaram a irromper, orbitando ao meu redor, como memórias exibidas diante dos meus olhos...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這段日子隨風而去，………歲月如走馬燈般，越來越快地疾馳而去…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这段日子随风而去，………岁月如走马灯般，越来越快地疾驰而去…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quei giorni furono sfogliati uno dopo l'altro... e l'indomani cominciò a balenare...

Steam (ST): The pages with drawings that had once been colorful... gradually began to change into the color of black ink...
Umineko Project (UP): The pages with drawings that were colorful...gradually changed into pages colored only with black ink......
PC Japanese (JP): カラフルだったイラストのページは、次第に黒いインク一色のページに様変わりしていく……。
Russian (RU): Страницы с рисунками, исполненными цветами, постепенно стали уступать место страницам с рисунками чёрных чернил...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As páginas com desenhos coloridos...gradualmente transformando as páginas coloridas com tinta preta......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 畫著彩畫的書頁，漸漸變成了只存在黑墨水的單色書頁……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 画着彩画的书页，渐渐变成了只存在黑墨水的单色书页……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le pagine con i disegni che una volta erano colorati... gradualmente iniziarono a cambiare nel colore di nero inchiostro...

Steam (ST): ...Eerie magic circles and demon summonings. Evil magic for harming people.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Eerie magic circles, and demon summonings.{n}Evil magic for harming people.
PC Japanese (JP): ……不気味な魔法陣や、悪魔の召喚術。人に害を為すための邪悪なる魔法。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……不気味な魔法陣や、悪魔の召喚術。{n}人に害を為すための邪悪なる魔法。
Russian (RU): ....Жутковатые магические круги и призывы демонов.{n}Злая магия, вредящая людям.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Misteriosos círculos mágicos e invocação de demônios.{n}Magia maligna para fazer mal às pessoas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……陰森森的魔法陣，惡魔召喚術。{n}目的為害人的邪惡魔法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……阴森森的魔法阵，恶魔召唤术。{n}目的为害人的邪恶魔法。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Lugubri cerchi magici ed evocazioni di demoni. Magie malvagie per ferire le persone.

Steam (ST): How could you give birth to magic that would cause the class bully to catch a cold?
Umineko Project (UP): What to do to create magic so that the class bully catches a cold.
PC Japanese (JP): どうやったら、クラスのいじめっこが風邪を引く魔法が生まれるか。
Russian (RU): Что заставило тебя породить магию, наводящую простуду на классного задиру?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como conceber uma magia para que todos da classe que fazem bullying fiquem resfriados.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 怎麼做，才能創造出令班上愛欺負人的孩子得感冒的魔法？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 怎么做，才能创造出令班上爱欺负人的孩子得感冒的魔法？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come si può dare vita ad una magia che fa prendere il raffreddore al bullo della classe?

Steam (ST): How could you give birth to magic that would seriously injure someone in class so that they died?
Umineko Project (UP): What to do to create magic so that you‐know‐who in class gets seriously injured and dies.
PC Japanese (JP): どうやったら、クラスの誰それが大怪我をして死んでしまう魔法が生まれるか。
Russian (RU): Что заставило тебя породить магию, наносящую кому‐то в классе смертельную травму.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como conceber uma magia para que a você‐sabe‐quem da classe fique seriamente ferida e morra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 怎麼做，才能創造出令班上的某某人受重傷死掉的魔法？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 怎么做，才能创造出令班上的某某人受重伤死掉的魔法？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come si può dare vita ad una magia che ferisce in modo serio qualcuno della classe così che muoia?

Steam (ST): How could you give birth to magic that would cause a bus loaded with all the bullies to fall off a cliff?
Umineko Project (UP): What to do to create magic so that a bus with all the bullies on it falls off a cliff.
PC Japanese (JP): どうやったら、いじめっこ全員の乗ったバスが崖から落っこちる魔法が生まれるか。
Russian (RU): Почему ты породила магию, благодаря которой автобус, полный твоих обидчиков, упадёт с обрыва?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como conceber uma magia para que os ônibus com aqueles que fazem bullying caiam de um penhasco.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 怎麼做，才能創造出令乘坐著全體愛欺負人的孩子的巴士墜落懸崖的魔法？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 怎么做，才能创造出令乘坐着全体爱欺负人的孩子的巴士坠落悬崖的魔法？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come si può dare vita ad una magia che farebbe cadere da un dirupo un bus con al suo interno tutti i bulli?

Steam (ST): Malicious spells were created one after another, ...burying the pages and her heart...
Umineko Project (UP): Malicious magics were created one after another, ......filling the pages and her heart...
PC Japanese (JP): 陰湿な魔法が次々に生まれて、……ページと彼女の心を、埋め尽くしていく…。
Russian (RU): Злобные магии создавались одна за другой, погребая под собой страницы гримуара и её сердце...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Maliciosas magias foram criadas uma após a outra, ......preenchendo as páginas e o coração dela...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一個接一個地被創造出來的，陰濕的魔法，……填滿了書頁，與她的心…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一个接一个地被创造出来的，阴湿的魔法，……填满了书页，与她的心…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Magie malvagie furono create una dopo l'altra... seppellendo le pagine e il suo cuore...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "Because I hurt Onee-chan, Mariage Sorcière ended up like this. ......Onee-chan isn't a black, evil witch. ...She was a white, ...pure, innocent, ...kind witch..."
Umineko Project (UP): "It was because I hurt you, Onee‐chan...that Mariage Sorcière ended up like this. .........You aren't a black, evil witch. ......You were a white, ......pure, innocent, ......kind witch......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「私が、お姉ちゃんを傷つけたから。マリアージュ・ソルシエールは、こんなになってしまった。………お姉ちゃんは黒き邪悪な魔女じゃない。……白き、……無垢で無邪気な、……やさしい魔女だったのよ……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私が、お姉ちゃんを傷つけたから。マリアージュ・ソルシエールは、こんなになってしまった。………お姉ちゃんは黒き邪悪な魔女じゃない。……白き、……無垢で無邪気な、……やさしい魔女だったのよ……」
Russian (RU): "Поскольку я ранила сестричку... Меридж Сорьсер докатился до такого. .........Онее‐чан не злая, чёрная ведьма. .....Она была белой, чистой, невинной... доброй ведьмой..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Foi porque eu a feri, onee‐chan...que a Mariage Sorcière acabou dessa forma. .........Você não é uma bruxa maligna da escuridão. ......Você é uma pura, ......alva, inocente, ......e gentil bruxa......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「都是因為我傷害了姐姐。Mariage Sorcière 才變成了這副樣子。………姐姐本不是漆黑邪惡的魔女。……她曾是一個，……潔白無垢、天真無邪的，……溫柔的魔女……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「都是因为我伤害了姐姐。Mariage Sorcière 才变成了这副样子。………姐姐本不是漆黑邪恶的魔女。……她曾是一个，……洁白无垢、天真无邪的，……温柔的魔女……」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Perché io ho ferito Onee-chan... il Mariage Sorcière è finito così. ... Onee-chan non è un'oscura strega malvagia. ... Lei era una candida... pura, innocente... gentile strega...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "...I'll...return it to how it was. I'll bring back the original Maria onee-chan, ...the one who scattered magic to make people happy across the entire world.
Umineko Project (UP): "......I'll...return you to how you were. Originally, when you were scattering magic to make people happy across the entire world. ......I'll turn you back into that Maria onee‐chan."
PC Japanese (JP): ……私が、元に戻してあげる。元の、みんなを幸せにする魔法を世界中に振りまいていた、……真里亞お姉ちゃんに戻してあげる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……私が、元に戻してあげる。元の、みんなを幸せにする魔法を世界中に振りまいていた、……真里亞お姉ちゃんに戻してあげる」
Russian (RU): ".....Я... преображу альянс в такой, каким он был изначально. Я верну прежнюю Марию онее‐чан, ту, что рассеяла магию, стремясь подарить счастье всем людям в мире."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Eu irei...fazer com que volte a ser como era. Originalmente, quando você espalhava através do mundo a magia para fazer as pessoas felizes. ......Eu farei você voltar a ser essa Maria onee‐chan."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……我，來讓姐姐變回原樣。我來讓姐姐變回原先的，到處分發令大家變幸福的魔法的，……真里亞姐姐。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……我，来让姐姐变回原样。我来让姐姐变回原先的，到处分发令大家变幸福的魔法的，……真里亚姐姐。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Io lo... farò tornare com'era. Porterò indietro la Maria Onee-chan di una volta... quella che ha diffuso nel mondo intero la magia per rendere felici le persone.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): ...That's the reason I came here. I was guided by fate. ......Maria onee-chan, can you hear me...? ......Show yourself before me......!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "......That is the reason I came here. I was guided by fate. ............Onee‐chan, can you hear me......? Show yourself.........before me.........!!"
PC Japanese (JP): ……その為に、私はここへ来た。運命に導かれてきた。…………お姉ちゃん、聞こえてる……？　その姿を、………私の前に見せて………！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……その為に、私はここへ来た。運命に導かれてきた。…………お姉ちゃん、聞こえてる……？　その姿を、………私の前に見せて………！！」
Russian (RU): ".....Вот почему я пришла сюда. Меня привела сама судьба. ............Мария онее‐чан, ты меня слышишь? ......Предстань передо мной!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......É por isso que eu vim aqui. Eu fui guiada pelo destino. ............Onee‐chan, você consegue me ouvir......? Me deixe.........ver a sua forma.........!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……我是為此，才來到了此處。受命運指引而來。…………姐姐，聽得到嗎……？請在我的眼前，………現身吧………！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……我是为此，才来到了此处。受命运指引而来。…………姐姐，听得到吗……？请在我的眼前，………现身吧………！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Questo è il motivo per cui sono venuta qui. Sono stata guidata dal destino. ... Maria Onee-chan, puoi sentirmi...? Mostrati davanti a me...!!"

Steam (ST): That voice rode an even stronger wind and was sent 12 years into the past...
Umineko Project (UP): That voice rode an even stronger wind, and was sent twelve years into the past......
PC Japanese (JP): その声は、さらに強い風に乗って、１２年前に届けられる……。
Russian (RU): Голос подхватил ещё более сильный ветер и послал его на 12 лет в прошлое...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquela voz juntou‐se a um vento ainda mais forte e foi enviada para doze anos no passado......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我的呼喊，乘強風而去，去了十二年前……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我的呼喊，乘强风而去，去了十二年前……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quella voce cavalcò un vento ancora più forte e fu mandata 12 anni nel passato...

Steam (ST): Then, ...the wind gradually ceased, ......and silence fell...
Umineko Project (UP): Then, ......the wind gradually ceased, .........and silence fell......
PC Japanese (JP): そして、……ゆっくりと風は止み、………沈黙が訪れた……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そして、……ゆっくりと風は止み、………沈黙が訪れた……。
Russian (RU): А затем, ветер постепенно затих, и настала тишина...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, ......o vento gradualmente cessou, .........e o silêncio permaneceu......

Umineko Project (UP): Crunch, crunch. ......I could hear the sound of gravel being stepped on.

Russian (RU): *хрусть*, *хрусть*. Я услышала, как кто‐то ступает по гравию.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): *crunch*crunch*. ......Eu pude ouvir o som de cascalhos sendo pisados.

Steam (ST): I listened to those footsteps, surprised at this miracle. ...Without a doubt, those were Maria onee-chan's footsteps.
Umineko Project (UP): I heard those footsteps, and was surprised at that miracle.{n}......Without a doubt, those footsteps were Maria onee‐chan's.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 我听到这脚步声，为这奇迹吓了一跳。{n}……这个声音，千真万确，就是真里亚姐姐的脚步声。
