Steam (ST): ...Before I knew it, Aunt Kasumi and her black-suits, a total of seven people who didn't resemble Maria onee-chan in the slightest, were standing there, surrounding me.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Before I knew it, Aunt Kasumi and her black‐suits, a total of seven people who didn't resemble Maria onee‐chan in the slightest, were standing there, surrounding me.
PC Japanese (JP): ……真里亞お姉ちゃんとは、似ても似つかない霞叔母さんと黒服たちが、いつの間にか７人も、私を取り囲むように、そこにいた。
Russian (RU): Не успела я собраться с мыслями, как тётя Касуми со своими амбалами в чёрных костюмах, итого семь человек, ничуть не походивших на Марию, окружили меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Antes que eu percebesse, a tia Kasumi e seus homens de ternos pretos, um total de sete pessoas que não se pareciam absolutamente nada com a Maria onee‐chan, estavam ali, me cercando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……與真里亞姐姐毫無相似之處的霞姨母與黑衣人，不知從何時起，七人站成圈地，將我圍在了中間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……与真里亚姐姐毫无相似之处的霞姨母与黑衣人，不知从何时起，七人站成圈地，将我围在了中间。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Prima che me ne accorgessi, Kasumi oba-san e i suoi uomini in nero, un totale di sette persone che non assomigliano minimamente a Maria Onee-chan, erano lì, circondandomi.

Steam (ST): And it felt like my voice had been just about to reach Maria onee-chan, too...
Umineko Project (UP): And it felt like my voice had been just about to reach Maria onee‐chan, too......
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞お姉ちゃんに、もう少しで声が届きそうだったのに……。
Russian (RU): А ведь я ощутила, что мой голос почти достиг Марии онее‐чан...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu senti que minha voz estava quase alcançando a Maria onee‐chan......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 明明只差一點點，就能把我的呼喚送入真里亞姐姐耳中了……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 明明只差一点点，就能把我的呼唤送入真里亚姐姐耳中了……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E io sentivo anche che la mia voce stesse quasi per raggiungere Maria Onee-chan...

Steam (ST): ...Because of these guys' toxin, ......that magic was cut off...
Umineko Project (UP): ...Because of these guys' toxin, .........the magic got interrupted...
PC Japanese (JP): …こいつらの毒素のせいで、………魔法が途切れてしまった…。
Russian (RU): Но из‐за токсина этих людишек магия оказалась грубейшим образом прервана.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Mas por causa das toxinas dessa gente, .........a magia foi interrompida...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …都是因為他們的毒素作怪，………魔法被打斷了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …都是因为他们的毒素作怪，………魔法被打断了…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Per via della tossina di queste persone... la magia era stata interrotta...

Steam (ST): Ange clicked her tongue at that, but Kasumi probably didn't hear it that way.
Umineko Project (UP): Ange clicked her tongue at that, but Kasumi probably didn't hear it that way.
PC Japanese (JP): 縁寿はそれを舌打ちするが、霞にはそういう意味には聞こえなかったろう。
Russian (RU): Энджи раздражённо цокнула языком, но Касуми, похоже, истолковала это иначе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ange estalou a língua, mas Kasumi provavelmente não entendeu dessa forma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然緣壽在為此咂嘴，但霞是聽不出這個意思的吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然缘寿在为此咂嘴，但霞是听不出这个意思的吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ange scioccò la lingua per questo fatto, ma Kasumi probabilmente non la interpretò così.

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "......Hmmmm. Are those flowers for your deceased family? ...How admirable. You're going to throw them, right? Go ahead, we'll wait that long."
Umineko Project (UP): "............Oh? Are those flowers for your deceased family? ......How admirable. You're going to throw them, right? That's alright, we'll wait that long."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………ふぅん。そのお花は、亡くなった家族への？……偉いわぁ。それ、投げるんでしょ？　いいわよ、それまで待ってあげる。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………ふぅん。そのお花は、亡くなった家族への？　……偉いわぁ。それ、投げるんでしょ？　いいわよ、それまで待ってあげる」
Russian (RU): "............Хм‐м‐м. Это цветы для твоей покойной семьи? ......Достойно уважения. Ты ведь собираешься их бросить, верно? Валяй, уж столько мы можем подождать."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Oh? Essas flores são para a sua falecida família? ......Que admirável.{n}Você vai jogar elas, certo? Tudo bem, nós podemos esperar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………哼——。這花，是為去世的家人準備的？……真懂事呢。這個是要扔下去吧？請吧，我們等到你獻完。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………哼——。这花，是为去世的家人准备的？……真懂事呢。这个是要扔下去吧？请吧，我们等到你献完。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Hmmmm. Quei fiori sono per la tua famiglia morta? ... Che gesto ammirevole. Stai per lanciarli, vero? Fai pure, aspetteremo."

Steam (ST): ...Just what are you waiting for...? ...But Ange could more or less guess.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Before what.{n}...Ange could more or less guess.
PC Japanese (JP): ……何を待つというのか。…だが、縁寿には大体察しがついていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……何を待つというのか。{n}…だが、縁寿には大体察しがついていた。
Russian (RU): .....И чего, спрашивается, ты ждешь?{n}Энджи более и менее догадывалась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Antes do quê?{n}...Ange mais ou menos sabia do que se tratava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……是要等著做什麼？{n}…不過，緣壽已經大致猜到了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……是要等着做什么？{n}…不过，缘寿已经大致猜到了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E che cosa stareste aspettando... Ange poteva capirlo più o meno.

Steam (ST): The way the black-suits unnaturally stuck their hands into their pockets clearly brought to mind the likelihood that they had handguns.
Umineko Project (UP): The way the black‐suits had their hands unnaturally stuck into their pockets made me realize that they were obviously in possession of handguns.
PC Japanese (JP): 黒服たちの、不自然にポケットに突っ込んだ手などは、明らかな拳銃の所持を想起させる。
Russian (RU): То, как её амбалы неестественно держали руки в карманах, наводило на мысль, что у них есть пистолеты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A forma nada natural como os homens de terno estavam com as mãos dentro dos bolsos fez eu perceber que eles claramente estavam portando armas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黑衣人們那不自然地將手插在口袋裡的姿勢，令人明明白白地聯想到了，他們拿著手槍。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黑衣人们那不自然地将手插在口袋里的姿势，令人明明白白地联想到了，他们拿着手枪。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il modo innaturale in cui gli uomini in nero tenevano la mano nelle loro giacche faceva capire che erano in possesso di pistole.

Steam (ST): ......This is a deserted island. There could be no more convenient place to dispose of someone.
Umineko Project (UP): .........This is a deserted island.{n}There could be no more convenient place to dispose of someone.
PC Japanese (JP): ………ここは無人島。これほど都合のいい処理の場所はあるまい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ………ここは無人島。{n}これほど都合のいい処理の場所はあるまい。
Russian (RU): Тогда как этот остров необитаем.{n}Удобнее места, чтобы от кого‐то избавится, не найти.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Esta é uma ilha deserta.{n}Não poderia haver lugar melhor para desovar alguém.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………這裡是無人島。{n}再也沒有比這更便於“辦事”的地方了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………这里是无人岛。{n}再也没有比这更便于“办事”的地方了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Questa è un'isola deserta. Non c'è posto migliore per occuparsi di qualcuno.

Steam (ST): I have absolutely no interest in the family matters of the Sumadera family.
Umineko Project (UP): I have absolutely no interest in the family matters of the Sumadera family.
PC Japanese (JP): 須磨寺家のお家事情などまったく興味はない。
Russian (RU): Мне глубоко безразличны дела семьи Сумадера.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu não tenho absolutamente nenhum interesse nos assuntos da família Sumadera.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我對須磨寺家的情況完全沒有興趣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我对须磨寺家的情况完全没有兴趣。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non mi interessano minimamente i problemi della famiglia Sumadera.

Steam (ST): ...But if I die, all that wealth will go to them.
Umineko Project (UP): ...But if I die, all of that wealth will roll right into the Sumadera family coffers.
PC Japanese (JP): …しかし、私が死ねば、ごろりと全ての財産は須磨寺家に転がり込むのだ。
Russian (RU): Но если я умру, всё богатство перейдёт к ним.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Mas se eu morrer, toda a riqueza entraria direto nos cofres da família Sumadera.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …不過，我要是死了，所有的財產就都會滾進須磨寺家的腰包。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …不过，我要是死了，所有的财产就都会滚进须磨寺家的腰包。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma se morissi, tutto il mio denaro finirebbe nelle loro tasche.

Steam (ST): Unlike me, they're probably very interested and concerned about this matter.
Umineko Project (UP): Unlike me, they probably have a great deal of interest in it.
PC Japanese (JP): 私と違い、大いに興味も関心もあるだろう。
Russian (RU): В отличие от меня, они в нём крайне заинтересованы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Diferente de mim, eles provavelmente têm muito interesse nela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 與我不一樣，他們是對我抱有巨大的興趣與關心的吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 与我不一样，他们是对我抱有巨大的兴趣与关心的吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Diversamente da me, ne sono molto attratti.

Steam (ST): Of course, it seems that if the massive amounts of stock I own suddenly go to them, it'll be pretty bad for the Ushiromiya Group as well, and they're apparently having a secret feud, fighting over me all by themselves.
Umineko Project (UP): Of course, the Ushiromiya Group has a stake in this, too—it seems that if the massive amounts of stock I own suddenly go to the Sumaderas, it'll be pretty bad for the Ushiromiya Group as well, and so they've apparently gotten themselves embroiled in a secret feud over me.
PC Japanese (JP): もちろん、一方の右代宮グループも、私の保有する大量の株が、ごろりとそちらに行ってしまうのは色々とまずいらしく、私を奪い合って、勝手に暗闘を繰り広げているらしい。
Russian (RU): Разумеется, достанься им нехилый объём принадлежащей мне собственности — и группе Уширомия окажется нанесён очень болезненный удар, так что они, как пить дать, втайне враждуют за меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro, o Ushiromiya Group tinha uma participação nisso também — parece que se a grande quantidade de ações que eu detenho for direto para os Sumaderas, acabaria sendo bem ruim para o Ushiromiya Group também, e por isso eles aparentemente se envolveram em uma disputa secreta sobre mim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當然，另一方面，右代宮集團貌似也是因為我所持有的大量股票，要是被須磨寺家奪走了，就會相當不妙，而在為了爭搶我，顧自與他們展開暗鬥。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当然，另一方面，右代宫集团貌似也是因为我所持有的大量股票，要是被须磨寺家夺走了，就会相当不妙，而在为了争抢我，顾自与他们展开暗斗。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Chiaramente, sembra che se quell'enorme capitale finisse improvvisamente nelle loro mani, sarebbe un bel problema anche per il gruppo Ushiromiya, e pare che abbiano una faida segreta in cui si contendono me.

Steam (ST): ...That's probably why President Okonogi gave me Amakusa as a guard.
Umineko Project (UP): ......That's probably why President Okonogi gave me Amakusa as a guard.
PC Japanese (JP): ……小此木社長が私に天草という護衛を付けてくれたのも、そういう意味のはず。
Russian (RU): Именно это, похоже, побудило президента Оконоги приставить ко мне Амакусу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Provavelmente é por isso que o presidente Okonogi contratou o Amakusa para ser meu guarda.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……小此木社長給我派天草這個保鏢，就理應帶有此意。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……小此木社长给我派天草这个保镖，就理应带有此意。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Probabilmente è per questo che il presidente Okonogi mi ha affidata ad Amakusa.

Steam (ST): ......Having Amakusa wait on the boat was a regrettable mistake...
Umineko Project (UP): ............Having Amakusa wait on the boat was a regretful mistake...
PC Japanese (JP): …………天草を船に待たせてしまったのは、痛恨のミス…。
Russian (RU): Я запоздало пожалела, что оставила его на катере.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ............Deixar o Amakusa esperando no barco foi um erro fatal...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …………叫天草等在船上，真是太失策了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Far aspettare Amakusa sulla barca è stato un brutto errore...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "Aunt Kasumi, how long have you been waiting for this ambush...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "How long have you been waiting here in ambush......?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「叔母さん、いつからここで待ち伏せを……？」
Russian (RU): "Ну как, тётя, долго сидела в засаде?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Há quanto tempo está esperando aqui para essa emboscada......?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「姨母，你是從何時起埋伏在這兒的……？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「姨母，你是从何时起埋伏在这儿的……？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "oba-san, quanto hai aspettato per quest'imboscata...?"

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "Since early morning. Thanks to that, I'm completely tired of waiting. After all, there are no cafes or dressing rooms here."
Umineko Project (UP): "Since early morning. And I was getting thoroughly tired of waiting for you. There are no cafés or powder rooms here, you see."
PC Japanese (JP): 「早朝からよ。お陰で、すっかり待ちくたびれちゃったわ。何しろ喫茶店もお化粧室もないからねぇ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「早朝からよ。お陰で、すっかり待ちくたびれちゃったわ。何しろ喫茶店もお化粧室もないからねぇ」
Russian (RU): "С самого утра. Так что здорово утомилась от ожидания. Кафе и раздевалок тут, к сожалению, поблизости не наблюдается."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Desde de manhã cedo. E já estava ficando exausta de tanto esperar por você.{n}Não há nenhuma cafeteria ou toalete por aqui, sabia?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「從大清早起喲。拜其所賜，真是等得煩死了。畢竟，這裡既沒有咖啡館，也沒有化妝室啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「从大清早起哟。拜其所赐，真是等得烦死了。毕竟，这里既没有咖啡馆，也没有化妆室啊。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Da stamattina presto. Per questo sono davvero stanca di aspettare. Non ci sono bar o negozi di vestiti qui, dopotutto."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "No toilets either, so I guess you had to elegantly drop a load behind a tree. ......ack-"
Umineko Project (UP): "No toilets either, so I guess you had to elegantly drop a load behind a tree. .........ack—"
PC Japanese (JP): 「トイレもないから、お上品に木陰でひり出してたわけね。………ぐッ、」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「トイレもないから、お上品に木陰で用を済ませていたわけね。………ぐッ、」
Russian (RU): "И туалетов тоже. Тебе, видать, приходилось элегантно сбрасывать балласт за деревцем. .......акх‐."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Nem latrinas, então acredito que você teve que elegantemente usar a sombra de uma árvore. .........ack—"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「因為也沒有廁所，所以姨母是有溫文爾雅地在樹蔭下拉過大條吧。………咕、」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「因为也没有厕所，所以姨母是有温文尔雅地在树荫下拉过大条吧。………咕、」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Nemmeno bagni, quindi immagino che avrai dovuto farla dietro un albero. ... ack-"

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "A lady with half Sumadera blood flowing through her veins will not use such filthy words. ......You really are Sumadera Kyrie's child. Not a trace of grace."
Umineko Project (UP): "One who, in spite of herself, is a lady with half Sumadera blood flowing through her veins will not use such filthy words. .........You really are Sumadera Kyrie's child, aren't you? Not a trace of grace."
PC Japanese (JP): 「仮にも、須磨寺家の血を半分引いてる淑女が、そんな汚らしい言葉を使うんじゃないわ。………やっぱり須磨寺霧江の子ねぇ？　気品の欠片もありゃしない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「仮にも、須磨寺家の血を半分引いてる淑女が、そんな汚らわしい言葉を使うんじゃないわ。………やっぱり須磨寺霧江の子ねぇ？　気品の欠片もありゃしない」
Russian (RU): "Леди, в чьих жилах течёт половина крови Сумадера, не пристало так выражаться. .......Ты и впрямь дитя Сумадеры Кирие. Ни грамма изящества."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uma dama com parte do sangue da família Sumadera correndo em suas veias não deveria usar palavras sujas como essa. .........Você é mesmo filha da Sumadera Kyrie, certo? Nem um traço de graciosidade."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你再怎麼說，都是個流著一半須磨寺家的血的淑女，少把這種髒話說出口。………果然，是須磨寺霧江的孩子呢？連一丁點的氣質都沒有。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你再怎么说，都是个流着一半须磨寺家的血的淑女，少把这种脏话说出口。………果然，是须磨寺雾江的孩子呢？连一丁点的气质都没有。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Una signorina con metà del sangue dei Sumadera nelle vene non dovrebbe usare un linguaggio così scurrile. ... Sei davvero la figlia di Sumadera Kyrie. Nemmeno un briciolo di grazia."

Steam (ST): She grabbed me by the hair and forced my face up to hers. And then spat at me.
Umineko Project (UP): She grabbed me by the hair and forced my face up to hers.{n}And then spat in it.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は髪を掴み上げられ、無理やり顔を寄せられる。そして唾を吐きかけられた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 私は髪を掴み上げられ、無理やり顔を寄せられる。{n}そして唾を吐きかけられた。
Russian (RU): Схватив и дёрнув меня за волосы, она заставила меня взглянуть ей в лицо.{n}А затем плюнула на меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela agarrou meu cabelo e me forçou a ficar cara a cara com ela.{n}E cuspiu mim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我被拎起頭髮，硬拽到她面前。{n}挨了一臉的唾沫。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我被拎起头发，硬拽到她面前。{n}挨了一脸的唾沫。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mi afferrò per i capelli, costringendomi a guardarla in faccia. Dopodiché mi sputò.

Steam (ST): ...My words might be filthy, but they're no worse than her spit.
Umineko Project (UP): ......My words are filthy, but her spit's not to be outdone.
PC Japanese (JP): ……私の言葉も汚いが、こいつの唾も負けていない。
Russian (RU): Я, может, и выразилась не очень приятно, но мои слова вряд ли хуже, чем её слюна.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Minhas palavras podiam ser imundas, mas não piores do que o cuspe dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……雖然我的話很髒，但這傢伙的唾沫也是毫不遜色。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……虽然我的话很脏，但这家伙的唾沫也是毫不逊色。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Le mie parole potranno essere volgari, ma non sono peggio del suo sputo.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "......Every time you talk to me, Aunt Kasumi, it's always about Mom. ...Am I really that much like my mother?"
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Every time you talk about me, it's always with reference to Mom. ...Am I really that much like my mother?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………叔母さんが私のことを話すと、いつも母さんのことばかり。…私、そんなにも母さんに似てますか。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………叔母さんが私のことを話すと、いつも母さんのことばかり。…私、そんなにも母さんに似てますか」
Russian (RU): "......Каждый раз, когда ты говоришь со мной, тётя, так всё о моей маме. Неужто так похожа?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Sempre que você fala sobre mim, é sempre para falar da minha mãe.{n}...Eu sou mesmo tão parecida assim com ela?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………姨母一與我說話，就總是提起媽媽。…我，是有這麼地像媽媽嗎？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………姨母一与我说话，就总是提起妈妈。…我，是有这么地像妈妈吗？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ogni volta che parli con me, oba-san, è sempre di Mamma. ... Somiglio davvero così tanto a mia Madre?"

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "Yes, you are. ......That impertinent gaze. Your mouth and nose are the same too.
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, you are. ...............That impertinent gaze. Your mouth and nose are the same too."
PC Japanese (JP): 「えぇ、似ているわ。……………その生意気そうな目つき。鼻も口もそっくりよ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「えぇ、似ているわ。……………その生意気そうな目つき。鼻も口もそっくりよ」
Russian (RU): "Да, ещё как. ............Этот дерзкий взгляд. Точно такие же нос и рот."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, você é. ...............Esse olhar impertinente. Sua boca e seu nariz também são iguais."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯，像哦。……………桀驁不馴的眼神。鼻子、嘴巴，全與她一模一樣。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯，像哦。……………桀骜不驯的眼神。鼻子、嘴巴，全与她一模一样。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Proprio così. ... Lo stesso sguardo impertinente. Anche la tua bocca e il tuo naso sono gli stessi.

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): ...Freewheeling and irresponsible. ...You thought nothing of the long history and tradition of the Sumadera family...and selfishly flew out of the house. Thanks to that, my entire life has been devoted to cleaning up your mess...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "......Unrestrained and irresponsible. ......She thought nothing of the long history and tradition of the Sumadera family, and selfishly flew out of the house. My entire life has been wiping up the messes she left behind...!"
PC Japanese (JP): ……自由奔放で無責任。……歴史と伝統ある須磨寺家の重みなど何も考えず、自分勝手に家を飛び出したわ。お陰で私の人生はずっと、その尻拭い…！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……自由奔放で無責任。……歴史と伝統ある須磨寺家の重みなど何も考えず、自分勝手に家を飛び出したわ。お陰で私の人生はずっと、その尻拭い…！」
Russian (RU): ".....Свободолюбивая и безответственная. ......Ты не придала никакого значения долгой истории и традициям семьи Сумадера и эгоистично вылетела из дома. Из‐за этого мне всю жизнь пришлось расхлёбывать заваренную тобою кашу!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Infrene e irresponsável. ......Ela não dava valor a longa história e tradição da família Sumadera, e deixou a casa egoistamente. Minha vida toda foi sobre limpar as bagunças que ela deixava para trás...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……自由奔放不負責任。……絲毫不考慮歷史與傳統兼備的須磨寺家的分量，只顧自己地逃離了家。拜她所賜，我的人生一直在給她擦屁股…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……自由奔放不负责任。……丝毫不考虑历史与传统兼备的须磨寺家的分量，只顾自己地逃离了家。拜她所赐，我的人生一直在给她擦屁股…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Libertina e irresponsabile. ... Non ti sei mai curate della lunga storia e delle tradizioni della famiglia Sumadera, e sei egoisticamente scappata di casa. {n}Grazie a te, ho passato la vita a rimediare ai tuoi casini...!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "I guess your life really has been covered with crap."
Umineko Project (UP): "I guess that makes your life one giant pile of shit."
PC Japanese (JP): 「まさにあんたの人生、クソまみれね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「まさにあんたの人生、クソまみれね」
Russian (RU): "Ну, это правда, что твоя жизнь была отстойной."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Suponho que sua vida tenha sido coberta de merda."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「倒正可謂是，你的人生粘滿了屎呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「倒正可谓是，你的人生粘满了屎呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Beh, è vero che la tua vita è stata uno schifo."

Steam (ST): When I was slapped on the cheek, my ear was smashed, and for an instant, my head rang...
Umineko Project (UP): I was slapped on the cheek, my ear took a heavy hit, and for an instant, my head rang...
PC Japanese (JP): 頬を打たれた時、耳を強打され、一瞬、頭がキーンとなった…。
Russian (RU): В ответ мне залепили пощёчину, прямо по уху, так, что на мгновение в голове зазвенело...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu levei um tapa na bochecha, minha orelha foi atingida com força, e por um instante minha cabeça estremeceu...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被扇巴掌時，耳朵被重重拍到，在那一瞬間，腦子“嗡”地一響…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被扇巴掌时，耳朵被重重拍到，在那一瞬间，脑子“嗡”地一响…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando fui schiaffeggiata, venni colpita sull'orecchio, e per un attimo mi sentii perdere l'equilibrio...

Steam (ST): ......My hair was pulled, spinning me around, and I fell to the ground.
Umineko Project (UP): .........She pulled me around by the hair, and threw me onto the ground.
PC Japanese (JP): ………そして、髪を引っ張って振り回され、私は地面に転がされる。
Russian (RU): Меня схватили за волосы и резко развернули, из‐за чего я не устояла на ногах и упала на землю.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Ela me puxou pelo cabelo e me jogou no chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………接著，她拽起我頭髮就是一扔，我跌倒在地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………接着，她拽起我头发就是一扔，我跌倒在地。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Lasciò andare i miei capelli, facendomi roteare, e caddi al suolo.

Steam (ST): And in a flash, the ground was kicked and I was struck with sand.
Umineko Project (UP): And without a moment's pause, she kicked the ground, covering me in sand.
PC Japanese (JP): それから間髪を入れず地面を蹴られて砂を掛けられた。
Russian (RU): По земле тут же ударили ногой, послав мне в лицо песок.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sem parar um instante, ela chutou o chão, me cobrindo de areia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而我剛倒下，就立刻被她從地面踢起的沙子潑到了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而我刚倒下，就立刻被她从地面踢起的沙子泼到了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E in un istante, qualcuno calciò il terreno e fui ricoperta di sabbia.

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "Yes, you truly are like Nee-san. That gaze! That gaze like you're mocking me somehow. Yes, I remember so many things!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, you truly have become so very like Nee‐san. That gaze! That gaze like you're somehow making fun of me. Yes, it's all coming back, all of it!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「あぁ、本当に姉さんに似てきたわぁ。その目つき！　その、どこか小馬鹿にした目つきよ。あぁ、思い出すわ、色々と！」
Russian (RU): "Да, ты и впрямь как сестра. Этот взгляд! Этот взгляд, словно ты как‐то насмехаешься надо мной. Да, я помню, много чего!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, você realmente se tornou parecida com a nee‐san. Esse olhar! Esse olhar seu, como se estivesse rindo de mim. Sim, está voltando, tudo está voltando!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「啊——，真的好像姐姐呢。就是這種眼神！就是這種宛如在小瞧人的眼神喲。啊——，想起來了，想起了好多！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「啊——，真的好像姐姐呢。就是这种眼神！就是这种宛如在小瞧人的眼神哟。啊——，想起来了，想起了好多！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Già, sei proprio come Nee-san. Quello sguardo! Come se ti stessi prendendo gioco di me. Sì, mi fa ricordare molte cose!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "......You're a sad person. I'll bet that since you were young, you always got compared to Mom and scorned. ...And for your entire life, you'll never be released from that wretchedness."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........You are pitiful. I imagine that since you were young, you were always compared against Mom and looked down upon. ......And for the entire rest of your life, you'll never be released from that misery."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………哀れな人ね。きっと幼い頃から、何かにつけて母さんに比較されて蔑まれてきたんでしょうに。……そしてあんたは一生、その惨めさから解放されやしないわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………哀れな人ね。きっと幼い頃から、何かにつけて母さんに比較されて蔑まされてきたんでしょうに。……そしてあんたは一生、その惨めさから解放されやしないわ」
Russian (RU): "......Ты жалкая женщина. Вполне могу себе представить, что когда ты была помоложе, тебя вечно сравнивали с мамой и презирали. .....И пока ты жива, эта грязь не отпустит тебя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Você é lamentável. Eu imagino que, desde que era jovem, você era sempre comparada com a minha mãe e desprezada. ......E pelo resto da sua vida, você nunca foi capaz de se libertar dessa miséria."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………可怜人。你一定是從小時候起，就一直在被人從種種方面上與我媽比較，一直遭受著輕蔑。……並且，你一生都無法從這份窩囊中得到解放。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………可怜人。你一定是从小时候起，就一直在被人从种种方面上与我妈比较，一直遭受着轻蔑。……并且，你一生都无法从这份窝囊中得到解放。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Fai pena. Immagino che tu sia stata paragonata a Mamma e sgridata fin da quando eri giovane. ... E per tutta la vita, non potrai mai liberarti da quella tristezza."

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "A little girl like you couldn't possibly understand. ...You see, your mother is a loser who threw everything away and ran away from the Sumadera family, right...? Do you know how much... how much trouble I went through because of that loser?!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "A little brat like you couldn't possibly understand. ......Your mother, you see, is a loser who threw away everything and ran away from the Sumadera family. Do you know how much...how {i:much} trouble I went through because of that loser?!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「お前みたいな小娘にはわからないわよ。……あんたのお母さんはね、何もかもを投げ出して須磨寺家を逃げ出した負け犬なのよ…？　その負け犬のせいで、私がどれほど…、どれほど迷惑したことかッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Сопливой девчонке вроде тебя ни за что не понять. ....Видишь ли, твоя мать была неудачницей, бросившей всё и сбежавшей из семьи Сумадера. Ты хоть знаешь через {i:что} мне пришлось пройти из‐за этой курвы?!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uma pirralha como você não é capaz de entender isso. ......A sua mãe é uma perdedora que jogou tudo fora e fugiu da família Sumadera, sabia? Você sabe o quanto eu...{i:quantos} problemas eu passei por causa daquela perdedora?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「像你這種小女孩是不會明白的。……你的母親啊，可是個把一切都拋下了，逃出了須磨寺家的喪家犬哦…？拜這條喪家犬所賜，我都遭了多大…、多大的罪啊！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「像你这种小女孩是不会明白的。……你的母亲啊，可是个把一切都抛下了，逃出了须磨寺家的丧家犬哦…？拜这条丧家犬所赐，我都遭了多大…、多大的罪啊！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Una ragazzina come te non potrebbe capire. ... Vedi, tua Madre è una perdente che ha gettato via tutto abbandonando la famiglia Sumadera, giusto...? {n}Sai quanti... quanti problemi ho avuto a causa di quella perdente?!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "Any trouble you went through has nothing to do with me. Sorry, but what am I supposed to do about something that happened before I was born?
Umineko Project (UP): "Any trouble you went through has nothing to do with me. Can't really do anything about what happened before I was born."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あんたの迷惑なんか私の知ったこっちゃないわ。私の生まれる前の話をされても困るわよ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あんたの迷惑なんか私の知ったこっちゃないわ。私の生まれる前の話をされても困るわよ」
Russian (RU): "Что бы тебе ни довелось испытать, меня это совершенно не касается. Люди обычно не имеют возможности повлиять на события, пока не родились."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Qualquer problema que você tenha passado não tem relação comigo.{n}Não posso fazer nada quanto a coisas que aconteceram antes de eu nascer."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你遭的罪關我屁事。跟我講我出生前的事，只會令我為難哦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你遭的罪关我屁事。跟我讲我出生前的事，只会令我为难哦。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "I tuoi problemi non hanno nulla a che vedere con me. Davvero, non posso far nulla per cose successe prima che nascessi.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): ......When will your life begin? ...It never will. For all eternity, you'll always, always continue to be sneered at by my dead mother until you die. ...If only you'd just die. Why are you living?"
Umineko Project (UP): ".........When is your life going to begin? ......It's never going to happen. You will continue to be sneered at by my dead mother, for ever and ever for all eternity until you die. ......In fact, why {i:don't} you die? Why are you alive?"
PC Japanese (JP): ………あんたの人生は、いつ始まるの？　……始まりゃしないわ。いつまでもいつまでも永久に、死んだ母さんに嘲笑われ続け、そのまま死ぬのよ。……というか死ねば？　何で生きてるの？」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………あんたの人生は、いつ始まるの？　……始まりゃしないわ。いつまでもいつまでも永久に、死んだ母さんに嘲笑われ続け、そのまま死ぬのよ。……というか死ねば？　何で生きてるの？」
Russian (RU): ".......Когда же начнётся твоя жизнь? .....Да никогда. Пока ты жива, ты вечно будешь подвергаться насмешкам со стороны моей покойной матери. ......Так почему бы тебе не умереть? Зачем ты живёшь?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Quando a sua vida vai começar? ......Isso nunca vai acontecer. Você vai continuar a ser zombada pela minha falecida mãe, para todo o sempre, por toda a eternidade, até a sua morte. ......Ou melhor, por que {i:não} morre? Por que está viva?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………你的人生，要從什麼時候開始？……不會有開始。你將永遠永遠永久地遭受我已故母親的嘲笑，就這麼步入死亡。……不如說，去死如何？幹嘛活著？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………你的人生，要从什么时候开始？……不会有开始。你将永远永远永久地遭受我已故母亲的嘲笑，就这么步入死亡。……不如说，去死如何？干嘛活着？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quando inizierà la tua vita? ... Mai. Per tutta l'eternità, continuerai sempre, sempre ad essere paragonata alla Mamma finché non morirai. ... Quindi perché non muori? Perché vivi?"

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "You little piss...!! You all...! Make her some tea."
Umineko Project (UP): "You little insolent pissant...!! Men...! Make her some tea."
PC Japanese (JP): 「このションベンガキが…！！あんたたち…！　ちょいとお茶をしてやりなさいな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「この口の減らないガキが…！！　あんたたち…！　ちょいとお茶をしてやりなさいな」
Russian (RU): "Ах ты, мелкая гнида!.. Так, все! Приготовьте‐ка ей чаю."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sua pirralha mijona e insolente...!! Vocês...! Preparem um pouco de chá para ela."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你這臭屁小鬼…！！你們幾個…！來給她上點茶。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你这臭屁小鬼…！！你们几个…！来给她上点茶。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Piccola stronza...!! Voi...! Preparatele del tè."

Steam (ST): "Heheheh... Leave it to us..."
Umineko Project (UP): "Heheheh... Leave it to us..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「へっへっへ…。お任せを…。」
Russian (RU): "Хе‐хе‐хе... Предоставьте это нам."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Heheheh... Pode deixar..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嘿嘿嘿…。包在我們身上…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嘿嘿嘿…。包在我们身上…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Heheheh... lasciatela a noi..."

Steam (ST): "You big-mouthed shitty brat. Let us teach you a little lesson."
Umineko Project (UP): "You big‐mouthed shitty brat. Let us teach you a little lesson."
PC Japanese (JP): 「口の聞き方も知らねぇ、クソガキが。少し勉強させてやるぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「口の聞き方も知らねぇ、クソガキが。少し勉強させてやるぜ」
Russian (RU): "Значит так, девка языкастая моя, пора нам преподать тебе небольшой урок."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sua pirralha de merda, boca‐suja. Vamos ensinar uma lição a você."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「連話都不會說的臭小鬼。我們來給你稍微上上課。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「连话都不会说的臭小鬼。我们来给你稍微上上课。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Mocciosa insolente. Lascia che ti insegniamo una lezioncina."

Steam (ST): The black-suits dashed up to me, violently grabbed me by the nape of the neck, and dragged me down.
Umineko Project (UP): The black‐suits dashed up to me, violently grabbed me by the collar, and dragged me down.
PC Japanese (JP): 黒服が、ささっと駆けて来て、私の襟首を乱暴に掴み、引き摺り倒す。
Russian (RU): Шестёрки в чёрных костюмах подбежали ко мне, сцапали за шею и оттащили в сторону.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os homens de terno correram na minha direção, me agarrando violentamente pelo pescoço e me jogando no chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黑衣人迅速地跑了上來，粗暴地拎起我的衣領，將我拖倒在地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黑衣人迅速地跑了上来，粗暴地拎起我的衣领，将我拖倒在地。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gli uomini in nero corsero verso di me, afferrandomi violentemente per il collo e schiacciandomi a terra.

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "Do whatever you want to her until my break is over. Teach my cute niece her place."
Umineko Project (UP): "Do as you like until I finish this smoke. Teach my darling niece a little of her place."
PC Japanese (JP): 「私が一服終えるまでに適当に。可愛い姪にちょいと身の程を教えてあげなさい。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私が一服終えるまでに適当に。可愛い姪にちょいと身の程を教えてあげなさい」
Russian (RU): "Делайте с ней, что хотите, пока не завершится мой перерыв. Укажите моей милой племяннице, где её место."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Façam o que quiserem até que eu termine de fumar. Ensinem minha fofa sobrinha o lugar dela."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「在我抽完這支煙前，適度地，好好教教我可愛的外甥女，何為分寸。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「在我抽完这支烟前，适度地，好好教教我可爱的外甥女，何为分寸。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Fatele quello che volete finché non finisce la mia pausa. Insegnate alla mia nipotina a stare al suo posto."

Steam (ST): Sumadera Kasumi. When I think about it, she was a pitiable person.
Umineko Project (UP): Sumadera Kasumi. She was a pitiable person, to think of it.
PC Japanese (JP): 須磨寺霞か。思えば可哀想な人だった。
Russian (RU): Сумадера Касуми. Если вдуматься, она достойна жалости.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sumadera Kasumi. Pensando nisso, ela era uma pessoa lamentável.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 須磨寺霞。想來是個可怜人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 须磨寺霞。想来是个可怜人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sumadera Kasumi. Ora che ci penso, è davvero una persona penosa.

Steam (ST): To the outside world, women of the Sumadera family were trained to be in a position that supported and deferred to men.
Umineko Project (UP): To the outside world, the women of the Sumadera family were trained to be in a position to support and defer to the men in the prominent positions.
PC Japanese (JP): 須磨寺家の女は、表向きは男を立てて一歩引いた位置にいるように躾けられている。
Russian (RU): В глазах окружающего мира женщины семьи Сумадера обучаются поддерживать и подчиняться мужчинам.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para o mundo exterior, as mulheres da família Sumadera eram treinadas para ocupar a posição de suportar e diferir homens em posições proeminentes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 須磨寺家的女人所受的管教是，在表面上當抬高男人，自身處於男人身後的位置。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 须磨寺家的女人所受的管教是，在表面上当抬高男人，自身处于男人身后的位置。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per il mondo esterno, le donne della famiglia Sumadera venivano allenate a supportare gli uomini.

Steam (ST): ...But in actuality, strong leadership was required from them, so that they could manage all the common people.
Umineko Project (UP): ......But in actuality, strong leadership was demanded of them so that they could manage all of the people under them.
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし実際は、下々の全てを取り仕切る強い指導力が求められる。
Russian (RU): На деле, однако, от них требовалось быть сильными лидерами, способными управлять простолюдинами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mas, na verdade, uma forte liderança era exigida delas, por isso elas eram capazes a lidar com todas as pessoas abaixo delas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不過實際上，她們被要求具有能夠一手處理所有台面下的事務的，超強的領導力。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不过实际上，她们被要求具有能够一手处理所有台面下的事务的，超强的领导力。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma in realtà, era richiesta loro una grande attitudine al commando in modo da poter amministrare i deboli.

Steam (ST): The role demanded of them really was that of a "female commander", like a literal reading of the word "okami" ({p:0:女将}).
Umineko Project (UP): The role demanded of them was that of a female commander.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The role demanded of them really was that of a "female commander", like a literal reading of the word "okami" ({p:0:{p:0:女将}}).
PC Japanese (JP): 文字通り、女将のような役割を求められるのだ。
Russian (RU): Они в прямом смысле должны были выступать в качестве помещиц.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O papel que era demandado dela era de uma comandante feminina, uma leitura literal de "okami"{p:0:(女将)}.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 要求她們能盡好字面意思上的女老板的職責。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 要求她们能尽好字面意思上的女老板的职责。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ricoprivano praticamente il ruolo di proprietarie terriere.

Steam (ST): Managing the Sumadera family with all its traditions was not something that could be accomplished with just an ordinary level of dignity.
Umineko Project (UP): Taking charge of the Sumadera family with all its proud history required an extraordinary level of commanding presence.
PC Japanese (JP): 伝統ある須磨寺家を取り仕切るのは、並大抵の貫禄では出来ない。
Russian (RU): Для управления семьёй Сумадера со всеми её традициями недостаточно было обыкновенного благородства.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assumir o controle da família Sumadera, com toda sua orgulhosa história, necessitava um nível extraordinário de presença dominante.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 要執掌傳統世家須磨寺家，沒有超乎尋常的威信是做不到的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 要执掌传统世家须磨寺家，没有超乎寻常的威信是做不到的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Prendersi cura della famiglia Sumadera con tutte quelle tradizioni non è qualcosa che si può fare solo mantenendo una certa dignità.

Steam (ST): It was an unimaginably heavy responsibility.
Umineko Project (UP): It was an unimaginably heavy responsibility.
PC Japanese (JP): それは想像を絶する重責だ。
Russian (RU): Эта была невообразимо тяжёлая ответственность.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma responsabilidade inimaginavelmente pesada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是份超乎想像的重擔。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是份超乎想象的重担。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era una responsabilità incredibile.

Steam (ST): Normally, this would have been demanded of Kyrie.
Umineko Project (UP): Normally, this would have been demanded of Kyrie.
PC Japanese (JP): それは本来ならば、霧江に求められるものだった。
Russian (RU): При обычных обстоятельствах её должна была взять на себя Кирие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Normalmente, isto seria demandando a Kyrie.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這本來是要求霧江承擔的責任。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这本来是要求雾江承担的责任。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Normalmente, tutto ciò sarebbe toccata a Kyrie.

Steam (ST): Kyrie had undergone that harsh training. And Kasumi, as the younger sister, should have been able to take it easy.
Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie had undergone that harsh training.{n}And Kasumi, as the younger sister, should have been able to just take it easy.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江にはその厳しい修行が。そして霞は妹としてのんびりしていれば良かった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 霧江にはその厳しい修行が。{n}そして霞は妹としてのんびりしていれば良かった。
Russian (RU): И она прошла через суровое обучение.{n}Тогда как Касуми, как младшая сестра, могла расслабиться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kyrie sofreu com esse árduo treinamento.{n}E Kasumi, como irmã mais nova, deveria ser capaz de relaxar mais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江去接受嚴苛的修行。{n}而霞只需作為妹妹，無憂無慮地過日子就行了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江去接受严苛的修行。{n}而霞只需作为妹妹，无忧无虑地过日子就行了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kyrie aveva sostenuto questo pesante addestramento. E Kasumi, in quanto sorella minore, avrebbe potuto rilassarsi.

Steam (ST): No, on the contrary, she had lived like a lazy, selfish and affluent princess, sneering at Kyrie, who had been given the heavy responsibility.
Umineko Project (UP): No, in fact, she had lived like a lazy, selfish, and affluent princess, sneering at Kyrie, who had been given the heavy responsibility.
PC Japanese (JP): いやむしろ、重責を課せられた霧江を嘲笑い、のんびりと裕福でわがままなお姫様生活をしていた。
Russian (RU): Нет, скорее она жила жизнью ленивой, эгоистичной и влиятельной принцессы, посмеиваясь над Кирие, обременённой тяжёлой ответственностью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não, de fato, ela viveu uma vida preguiçosa, egoísta e como uma afluente pessoa, zombando de Kyrie, que teve que assumir responsabilidades pesadas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不，不如說，她是在邊嘲笑著背上了重擔的霧江，邊悠閑地過著富裕嬌慣的公主生活。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不，不如说，她是在边嘲笑着背上了重担的雾江，边悠闲地过着富裕娇惯的公主生活。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): No, al contrario, lei ha vissuto come una principessa spensierata ed egoista, ridendo di Kyrie, su cui gravava quella grande responsabilità.

Steam (ST): ...However, Kyrie had suddenly been disinherited.
Umineko Project (UP): ......However, Kyrie was suddenly disinherited.
PC Japanese (JP): ……ところが。突然、霧江が勘当されることになった。
Russian (RU): .....Но так сложилось, что Кирие лишили наследства.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Entretanto, Kyrie deserdou de repente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……然而。突然，霧江被逐出了家門。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……然而。突然，雾江被逐出了家门。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Tuttavia. Kyrie fu improvvisamente disereditata.

Steam (ST): She had refused the fiancé her parents had arranged...and had gotten pregnant by her lover, Ushiromiya Rudolf.
Umineko Project (UP): She had refused the fiancé her parents had arranged, and had gotten pregnant by her lover, Ushiromiya Rudolf.
PC Japanese (JP): 親の設定した許婚を蹴り、右代宮留弗夫の愛人として妊娠していたのだ。
Russian (RU): Она решительно отказалась выходить замуж за человека, выбранного её родителями и забеременела от своего любимого человека, Уширомии Рудольфа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela recusou o noivo que seus pais haviam encontrado, e ficou grávida de seu amante, Ushiromiya Rudolf.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是因為，她一腳踢開了父母給她定的許婚，作為右代宮留弗夫的情人懷了孕。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是因为，她一脚踢开了父母给她定的许婚，作为右代宫留弗夫的情人怀了孕。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Aveva rifiutato il fidanzamento organizzato dai suoi genitori, ed era rimasta incinta del suo amante, Ushiromiya Rudolf.

Steam (ST): From the Sumaderas' perspective, even though the Ushiromiya family held a vast fortune, it was a low-level family that had already collapsed.
Umineko Project (UP): From the Sumadera family's perspective, even though the Ushiromiya family held a vast fortune, it was a family which had already collapsed, a family not in their league.
PC Japanese (JP): 須磨寺家から見た右代宮家は、莫大な財産は持っていても、すでに没落した格下の家と見られていた。
Russian (RU): В глазах семьи Сумадера, семья Уширомия, хоть и владеющая обширным состоянием, была второсортной семьёй, уже потерпевшей крах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Da perspectiva da família Sumadera, mesmo a família Ushiromiya tendo uma vasta fortuna, era uma família que já havia ruído, uma família que não estava no nível deles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 須磨寺家眼中的右代宮家，即便擁有莫大的財產，也是個早已沒落了的，比自家低一個級別的家族。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 须磨寺家眼中的右代宫家，即便拥有莫大的财产，也是个早已没落了的，比自家低一个级别的家族。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dal punto di vista della famiglia Sumadera, nonostante gli Ushiromiya avessero una cospicua fortuna, era una famiglia degradata prossima alla rovina.

Steam (ST): And to become not even a legal wife, but a mistress to the second son of that family...
Umineko Project (UP): And to become not even a legal wife, but a {i:lover} to the second son of that family...
PC Japanese (JP): しかもその家の次男坊の、正妻ならまだしも愛人とは…。
Russian (RU): Мало того, стать даже не законной женой, а {i:любовницей} второго сына семьи...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E ao não se tornar uma esposa legítima, mas uma {i:amante} para o segundo filho daquela família...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 給這種家族的二少爺當正妻，那還說得過去，可竟然是情人…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 给这种家族的二少爷当正妻，那还说得过去，可竟然是情人…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E non diventare nemmeno la moglie, ma l'amante del secondogenito di quella famiglia...

Steam (ST): Normally, a daughter of the main family would be shown no mercy for such dishonor.
Umineko Project (UP): Normally, no one would be shown mercy for something so dishonorable, not even a daughter of the main family.
PC Japanese (JP): 本来なら、これほどの不名誉ならば、本家の娘とて容赦はされない。
Russian (RU): Старшую дочь семьи, совершившую столь позорный поступок, ожидала бы суровая кара.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Normalmente, ninguém iria demonstrar pena por algo tão desonrado, nem mesmo sendo uma filha da família principal.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 本來的話，搞出這等不光彩的事，就算是本家的女兒也不可饒恕。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 本来的话，搞出这等不光彩的事，就算是本家的女儿也不可饶恕。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Normalmente, una figlia del casato principale non se la sarebbe cavata con poco per qualcosa di così disonorevole.

Steam (ST): They would wrap her up in a mat, place a pole on end, and throw her either into the Pacific Ocean if the pole fell to the right or the Sea of Japan if it fell to the left.
Umineko Project (UP): They would wrap her up in a mat, stand a pole on end, and throw her either into the Pacific Ocean if the pole fell to the right or the Sea of Japan if it fell to the left.
PC Japanese (JP): 棒を立てて、右に倒れれば太平洋、左に倒れれば日本海に、簀巻きにされて放り込まれているところだ。
Russian (RU): Её бы завернули в циновку, поставили бы на конец циновки шест, а затем бросили бы её в Тихий океан, если тот упадёт направо, либо в Японское море, если налево.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles iriam enrolá‐la em uma esteira de bambu, colocá‐la no topo de um poste e jogá‐la seja, no Oceano Pacífico se o poste caísse à direita, ou o Mar do Japão, caso caísse à esquerda.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 用草席裹起來，豎起一根棒子，棒子往右倒就扔太平洋，棒子往左倒就扔日本海。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 用草席裹起来，竖起一根棒子，棒子往右倒就扔太平洋，棒子往左倒就扔日本海。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'avrebbero arrotolata in un tappeto, piazzando un bastone all'estremità, per poi gettarla nell'Oceano Pacifico se il bastone fosse caduto a destra, viceversa nel Mar del Giappone.

Steam (ST): ......But Kyrie's punishment ended with disinheritance, an unbelievably warm-hearted decision.
Umineko Project (UP): .........But Kyrie's punishment was nothing but disinheritance, an unbelievably lenient decision.
PC Japanese (JP): ………しかし、霧江への処分は勘当のみで、信じられないくらいの温情判決だった。
Russian (RU): Однако Кирие лишь прогнали в шею, лишив наследства — невероятно мягкое наказание.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Mas a punição de Kyrie não foi nada mais do que deserdação, uma decisão inacreditavelmente leniente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………可是，實際給予霧江的處罰，卻僅僅是“逐出家門”這個令人難以置信的溫情判決。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………可是，实际给予雾江的处罚，却仅仅是“逐出家门”这个令人难以置信的温情判决。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma Kyrie fu soltanto disereditata, una decisione incredibilmente generosa.

Steam (ST): After that, the Sumadera family began receiving favorable treatment from a section of the Ushiromiya group. ...There must've been some kind of backroom deal.
Umineko Project (UP): After that, the Sumadera family began receiving preferential treatment from a section of the Ushiromiya Group. ......There must have been some kind of backroom deal.
PC Japanese (JP): その後、須磨寺家は右代宮グループの一部において、優遇的な措置を受けるようになる。……何らかの裏取引があったのは間違いない。
Russian (RU): После этого семья Сумадера стала пользоваться благосклонностью у определённой части группы Уширомия. .....Похоже, там имела место какая‐то подковёрная сделка.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois daquilo, a família Sumadera começou a receber tratamento preferencial vindo de uma seção do Ushiromiya Group. ......Devia haver algum tipo de acordo de bastidores.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在此之後，須磨寺家開始在與右代宮集團打交道的部分事務上享受優待。……肯定是有做過什麼幕後交易。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在此之后，须磨寺家开始在与右代宫集团打交道的部分事务上享受优待。……肯定是有做过什么幕后交易。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo questi fatti, la famiglia Sumadera cominciò a ricevere un trattamento di favore da una filiale del gruppo Ushiromiya. ... Doveva esserci un qualche accordo segreto.

Steam (ST): In other words, Kyrie openly left the Sumadera family under the pretense of gaining financial support from the Ushiromiya family.
Umineko Project (UP): In other words, Kyrie took advantage of the Ushiromiya family's financial support to leave the Sumadera family openly.
PC Japanese (JP): つまり霧江は、右代宮家からの経済支援をダシに、堂々と須磨寺家を出て行ったわけだ。
Russian (RU): Другими словам, Кирие открыто покинула семью Сумадера в обмен на финансовую поддержку от семьи Уширомия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em outras palavras, Kyrie tomou vantagem do suporte financeiro da família Ushiromiya para deixar a família Sumadera abertamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 也就是說，霧江是靠著右代宮家的經濟支援，堂堂正正地走出了須磨寺家。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 也就是说，雾江是靠着右代宫家的经济支援，堂堂正正地走出了须磨寺家。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In altre parole, Kyrie lasciava pubblicamente la famiglia Sumadera con la pretesa di avere supporto finanziario dalla famiglia Ushiromiya.

Steam (ST): Kasumi had watched it happen in shock. No, she even disparaged her dishonorable sister as a loser.
Umineko Project (UP): Kasumi watched it happen in shock.{n}No, she even disparaged her dishonorable sister as a loser.
PC Japanese (JP): 霞は呆然とそれを見送った。いや、不名誉な姉を負け犬と罵りさえした。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 霞は呆然とそれを見送った。{n}いや、不名誉な姉を負け犬と罵りさえした。
Russian (RU): Наблюдавшая это Касуми была в шоке.{n}Нет, она пренебрежительно отзывалась о своей бесчестной сестре как о неудачнице.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kasumi assistiu isso acontecer, estupefata.{n}Não, ela até mesmo depreciou sua desonrosa irmã como perdedora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霞目瞪口呆地目送姐姐走出家門。{n}不，她甚至還將不光彩的姐姐罵作喪家犬。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 霞目瞪口呆地目送姐姐走出家门。{n}不，她甚至还将不光彩的姐姐骂作丧家犬。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kasumi aveva assistito a tutto questo shockata. No, addirittura aveva marchiato la sua disonorevole sorella come una perdente.

Steam (ST): ...But, eventually... She realized that the heavy responsibilities Kyrie had borne would be passed on to her, and then, for the first time, she saw that she'd been outwitted...
Umineko Project (UP): ......But eventually......she learned that the heavy responsibilities Kyrie had borne would be passed on to her, and then, for the first time, she realized that she had been outwitted......
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし、やがて。霧江が背負っていた重責の全てが、自分に引き継がれることを知り、その時、初めて、出し抜かれたことに気付いたのだ……。
Russian (RU): А потом...До неё дошло, что тяжёлая ответственность, предназначавшаяся Кирие, перешла к ней, и впервые осознала, что её обвели вокруг пальца.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mas eventualmente......ela aprendeu que as pesadas responsabilidades que Kyrie havia suportado iriam passar para ela, e então, pela primeira vez, ela percebeu que estava sendo iludida......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……然而，沒過多久。通過知道了，霧江曾背負著的所有重擔，全都會由自己接手，她於此時首次意識到了，被姐姐先下手為強了……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……然而，没过多久。通过知道了，雾江曾背负着的所有重担，全都会由自己接手，她于此时首次意识到了，被姐姐先下手为强了……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma in seguito... si rese conto che il grave fardello con cui era nata Kyrie sarebbe passato a lei, e allora, per la prima volta, si rese di conto di essere stata giocata...

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "Because of your mother, my life was ruined. ...No, you could even say she killed me once. On that day, I was killed once and thrown into a hellish life..."
Umineko Project (UP): "Because of your mother, my life was turned into a mess. ......No, you could even say she killed me once. On that day, I was killed once and cast down into a hellish life..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あんたの母親のせいで、私の人生はめちゃめちゃにされたわ。……いいえ、一度殺されたと言ってもいい。あの日に私は一度殺されて、地獄のような日々に突き落とされたのよ…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あんたの母親のせいで、私の人生はめちゃめちゃにされたわ。……いいえ、一度殺されたと言ってもいい。あの日に私は一度殺されて、地獄のような日々に突き落とされたのよ…」
Russian (RU): "Твоя мать изломала мне всю жизнь. .....Нет, можно даже сказать, что она меня убила. В тот день я оказалась убита и ввергнута в адскую жизнь..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Por causa da sua mãe, minha vida se tornou uma bagunça. ......Não, você poderia até dizer que ela me matou uma vez. Naquele dia, eu fui morta e jogada em uma vida infernal..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「都怪你的母親，我的人生被搞得一團糟。……不，說是被殺了一次都行。在那天，我被殺死了一次，被推進了地獄般的生活…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「都怪你的母亲，我的人生被搞得一团糟。……不，说是被杀了一次都行。在那天，我被杀死了一次，被推进了地狱般的生活…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "A causa di tua Madre, la mia vita è stata una tragedia. ... No, si potrebbe addirittura dire che mi ha uccisa. Quel giorno, sono stata uccisa e scagliata in una vita infernale..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "......Isn't that what you get for making light of life until then? ...Gyack! ......Gah...gah..."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Isn't that just what you get for thinking you can breeze through life? ......gyack! .........*cough*, *cough*......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………それまで人生舐めてきたツケじゃない？……ぎゃふッ！………ごほっ、ごほ……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………それまで人生舐めてきたツケじゃない？　……ぎゃふッ！　………ごほっ、ごほ……」
Russian (RU): ".......Так разве не это ты получаешь, если относишься к жизни спустя рукава? ....гьяк! ......гхх, гхх..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Não é simplesmente porque você pensou que poderia levar a vida numa boa para sempre? ......Gyack! .........*cof*, *cof*......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………這不就是你一直以來小瞧人生所賒的帳嗎？……噶呀！………咳哄、咳……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………这不就是你一直以来小瞧人生所赊的帐吗？……噶呀！………咳哄、咳……」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Non è quello che ti meriti per essertela spassata fino a quel momento? ... gyack! ... gah, gah..."

Steam (ST): "Don't you ever stop talking, girl?! Hyaah!"

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 黒服に下腹を殴られ、うずくまる。{n}しかしすぐに襟首を掴まれ、立ち上がらせられた。

Steam (ST): Kasumi cold-heartedly looked down at me, smoking a cigarette... The painful days after Kyrie had left were floating through her mind.
Umineko Project (UP): As she continued to cold‐heartedly look down upon Ange, Kasumi blew out smoke......{n}The hard days after Kyrie left were floating through her mind.
PC Japanese (JP): 霞はそれを冷酷に見下ろしながら、煙草を吹かす……。彼女の脳裏に蘇るのは、霧江が出て行った後の辛い日々。

Russian (RU): Касуми хладнокровно наблюдала за моим избиением, покуривая сигарету.{n}Полные боли дни, последовавшие после ухода Кирие, проносились в её памяти.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 霞冷酷地俯视着这副情景，吞云吐雾……。{n}在她脑内浮现的是雾江走后的辛酸日子。

PC Japanese (JP): それまでは自由奔放、天真爛漫なただのお嬢様でいられた。……厳しく躾けられるのは長女の霧江だけで、次女の自分はただのお姫様でいられたのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それまでは自由奔放、天真爛漫なただのお嬢様でいられた。{n}……厳しく躾けられるのは長女の霧江だけで、次女の自分はただのお姫様でいられたのだ。
Russian (RU): Прежде ей позволяли быть обычной, свободной и наивной девушкой.{n}.....Суровое обучение обязана была проходить лишь старшая сестра — Кирие, тогда как младшая сестра могла жить как принцесса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Até então, fora permitido a ela viver a simples vida de uma jovem garota rica, livre e desafetada.{n}......Apenas Kyrie, a irmã mais velha, foi rigidamente treinada, enquanto ela, a irmã mais nova, foi capaz de viver a vida de uma princesa.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 在这之前，自己一直都只用去当自由奔放、天真烂漫的大小姐。{n}……要受严格管教的，仅为大女儿雾江一人，身为二女儿的自己能够只去当个公主。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Fino ad allora, le era stato permesso essere una semplice ragazza, libera e capricciosa. ... Solo la sorella maggiore, Kyrie, era stata duramente allenata, e lei, la sorella minore, poteva vivere come fosse una principessa.

Steam (ST): Then, suddenly, everything got flipped over...and her life came crashing down...
Umineko Project (UP): Then, suddenly, everything was turned over to such a degree that her life tumbled and crashed......
PC Japanese (JP): それが、突然、人生が転落するほどに全てが引っ繰り返って……。

Chinese Simplified (CN): 这些突然就如人生出轨般地全部翻了个个……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi, improvvisamente, tutto si era rovesciato, al punto che la sua vita venne schiacciata...

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "My life, lifestyle, and the way I lived...were all stolen from me. ......Do you know how much I was derided by those relatives who didn't know the details, all because of my sister's dishonor...? I detested her. I detested your mother enough to make me spit blood..."
Umineko Project (UP): "My life, lifestyle, way of living, ......everything was stolen from me. .........Do you know how much I was maligned based on my sister's dishonor by those relatives who didn't know the details...? ......I detested her. I detested your mother enough to make me spit blood..."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私の人生も、生活も、生き方も、……何もかもを奪われたわ。………事情を知らない親類からは、姉さんの不名誉を理由にどれだけ蔑まれたことか…。……呪ったわ。あなたのお母さんを血を吐くほどに呪ったわよ…」
Russian (RU): "Моя жизнь, стиль жизни, моё мировоззрение... Всё это у меня отобрали. ......Ты хоть знаешь, как из‐за бесчестья моей сестры надо мной насмехались родственники, не знающие подробностей? Я ненавидела её. Я ненавидела её так сильно, что готова была плеваться кровью..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Minha vida, meu estilo de vida, minha forma de viver, ......tudo foi tomado de mim. .........Você sabe o quanto eu fui difamada por causa da desonra da minha irmã por aqueles parentes que não sabiam sobre tudo...? ......Eu a detestava. Eu detestava sua mãe o suficiente para me fazer cuspir sangue..."

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "...I saw Nee-san at an Ushiromiya Group party once. ......She was with her husband, ......looking very happy...... and laughing. ...She... pushed everything onto me... and found happiness... ...only for herself......"
Umineko Project (UP): "......I saw Nee‐san at an Ushiromiya Group party once. ......She was with her husband, .........looking very happy, ......and laughing. ......She......pushed everything onto me, ......and found happiness.........only for herself........."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……姉さんを、右代宮グループのパーティで見かけたわ。……あいつ、旦那と一緒で、………とても幸せそうに、……笑ってやがったわ。……私に、……全部を押し付けて、……自分だけ、………幸せに………。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……姉さんを、右代宮グループのパーティで見かけたわ。……あいつ、旦那と一緒で、………とても幸せそうに、……笑ってやがったわ。……私に、……全部を押し付けて、……自分だけ、………幸せに………」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "......So what? How is taking it out on me going to make you happy? Will taking it out on me turn back time and change history or something?
Umineko Project (UP): ".........So what? How is taking it out on me going to make you happy? Is taking it out on me going to turn back time and change history for you or something?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………だから何？　私に八つ当たりすると、どうあんたが幸せになるってわけ？私に八つ当たりすると、時間が巻き戻って歴史が変わったりしてくれるわけ？
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………だから何？　私に八つ当たりすると、どうあんたが幸せになるってわけ？　私に八つ当たりすると、時間が巻き戻って歴史が変わったりしてくれるわけ？」
Russian (RU): "........Ну и что? Каким образом моё избиение сделает тебя счастливей? Что, время повернётся вспять и история изменится?"

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... E allora? Prendermi a calci ti renderà felice? Se mi prendi a calci potrai tornare indietro nel tempo e cambiare la storia?

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Uguhguhguh... gah... ghackk...!!"

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "You said something a short while ago... When will my life start? ......No matter how much I despise you or take out my frustrations on you, I can't turn back time. ...So, must I keep hating my sister even though she's gone, until I die?"
Umineko Project (UP): "You said something a short while ago... When is my life going to begin? .........No matter how much I despise you or take it out on you, I cannot turn back time. ......So am I doomed to keep on hating Nee‐san like this for the rest of my life, even though she's dead?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「あんた、さっき言ったわねぇ…。私の人生はいつ始まるの？って。………いくら恨んでも八つ当たりしても、時間を巻き戻すことなんて出来ない。……じゃあ私は死ぬまでこうして、死んでもなお姉さんを恨み続けて？
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あんた、さっき言ったわねぇ…。私の人生はいつ始まるの？　って。………いくら恨んでも八つ当たりしても、時間を巻き戻すことなんて出来ない。……じゃあ私は死ぬまでこうして、死んでもなお姉さんを恨み続けて？」
Russian (RU): "Ты недавно кое‐что сказала... Дескать, когда начнётся моя жизнь? .......Как бы я тебя ни презирала, как бы ни истязала, время действительно не повернуть вспять. .....Поэтому до самой своей смерти я буду ненавидеть сестру, хотя она уже давно как покойница?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você disse algo há pouco... Quando minha vida vai começar? .........Não importa o quanto eu odeie você ou deposite minha raiva, eu não posso voltar no tempo. ......Por isso estou condenada a continuar odiando a nee‐san assim pelo resto da minha vida, mesmo ela já estando morta?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你剛才有講過呢…。我的人生要何時才能開始？。………再怎麼恨她、再怎麼拿你撒氣，都無法倒轉時間。……那麼，我是得像這樣，將人都死了的姐姐恨到我死為止嗎？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你刚才有讲过呢…。我的人生要何时才能开始？。………再怎么恨她、再怎么拿你撒气，都无法倒转时间。……那么，我是得像这样，将人都死了的姐姐恨到我死为止吗？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Hai detto una cosa poco fa... quando inizierà la mia vita? ... Non importa quanto ti odi o quanto ti prenda a calci, non posso tornare indietro nel tempo. ... Quindi continuerò a odiare Onee-san finché non morirò anche se è già morta?

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然緣壽想用惡語回答，但她並沒有說出口。{n}…因為，一旦答了就又會被踹。
