Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ange stava per ribattere, ma si fermò. ... Perché sarebbe stata colpita di nuovo se avesse risposto.

Steam (ST): ...Even if Kasumi didn't say any more, Ange had a pretty good idea what she meant. Kasumi thought that by taking revenge against Kyrie's daughter, Ange, she'd be able to put an end to her hatred.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Even if Kasumi didn't say any more, it wasn't difficult to imagine what she meant.{n}Kasumi was thinking of bringing an end to her hatred of Kyrie by taking revenge against her daughter, Ange.
PC Japanese (JP): ……霞がそれ以上を語らなくても、どうせ想像はつく。霞は、霧江の娘の縁寿に復讐することで、その恨みに終止符を打とうと考えているわけだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……霞がそれ以上を語らなくても、どうせ想像はつく。{n}霞は、霧江の娘の縁寿に復讐することで、その恨みに終止符を打とうと考えているわけだ。
Russian (RU): Даже если Касуми больше ничего не сказала, Энджи вполне понимала, что та имела в виду.{n}Касуми считала, что отыгравшись на Энджи — дочери Кирие, она сможет положить конец своей ненависти.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mesmo se Kasumi não dissesse mais nada, não era difícil imaginar o que ela queria dizer. Kasumi estava pensando em trazer um fim ao seu ódio por Kyrie se vingando contra sua filha, Ange.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……反正不用霞繼續說下去，也能想像得到。{n}霞是在想著，通過對霧江的女兒緣壽進行復仇，來給這份恨畫上休止符。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……反正不用霞继续说下去，也能想象得到。{n}霞是在想着，通过对雾江的女儿缘寿进行复仇，来给这份恨画上休止符。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Anche se Kasumi non disse altro, Ange aveva capito bene cosa volesse intendere. Kasumi pensava che vendicandosi su Ange, la figlia di Kyrie, sarebbe stata in grado di porre fine al suo odio.

Steam (ST): ......Talk about pushing your problems onto other people.
Umineko Project (UP): .........Talk about pushing your problems on other people.
PC Japanese (JP): ………何と傍迷惑な。
Russian (RU): Прямо иллюстрация, как валят с больной головы на здоровую.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Falando sobre jogar seus problemas nos outros.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………何其煩擾無辜。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………何其烦扰无辜。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E poi parla di scaricare i problemi sugli altri.

Speaker: Sumadera Kasumi
Steam (ST): "Come on, stand up. If you like this island that much, I'll bury you deep in it. ......You don't want to die at your age, right? Don't you feel like saying "Sorry my mother caused you so much trouble", or something?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Come on, stand up. If you like this island that much, I'll bury you here deep. .........You don't want to die at your age, right? Don't you want to say "Sorry my mother caused you so much trouble", or something?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ほら、立ちなさいよ。そんなにこの島が大好きなら、しっかり深く埋めてあげるわよ。………その若さで死にたくないでしょ？　母が迷惑を掛けてすみませんでしたとか、言ってみたくはならない？」
Russian (RU): "Давай, вставай. Если тебе так мил этот остров, то я похороню тебя на нём глубоко‐глубоко. .......Ты ведь не хочешь помереть в таком возрасте, верно? Разве тебе не хочется сказать: 'Простите, что моя мать причинила вам столько бед', — или что‐то в это роде?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Vamos, levante‐se. Se você gosta tanto assim dessa ilha, eu vou te enterrar profundamente aqui. .........Você não quer morrer com essa idade, certo? Não quer dizer algo como "Desculpe pelos problemas que a minha mãe causou", ou algo assim?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「來呀，站起來呀。你這麼喜歡這個島的話，那就幫你好好埋得深深的哦。………不想這麼年輕就死吧？是不是有點想說“媽媽給您添了麻煩，對不起”了啊？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「来呀，站起来呀。你这么喜欢这个岛的话，那就帮你好好埋得深深的哦。………不想这么年轻就死吧？是不是有点想说“妈妈给您添了麻烦，对不起”了啊？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Avanti, alzati. Se ti piace così tanto quest'isola, ti ci seppellirò. ... Non vuoi morire a quest'età, vero? Non vuoi dire ‘mi dispiace che mia Madre ti abbia causato così tanti problemi’, o qualcosa del genere?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): ".........You... say something like that? ......Gwah, ......ghhh...!!"
Russian (RU): ".........Ага, щас, разбежалась. .........гвах, гххх!"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Chi direbbe mai... una cosa del genere. ... Gwah... guh...!!"

Speaker: Sakutarou
Steam (ST): ‘Uryu-!! Ange, Angeeeeee...!!’
Umineko Project (UP): ‘Uryuu!! Ange, Angeeeeee...!!’
PC Japanese (JP): 『うりゅー！！　縁寿ッ、縁寿ぇえぇ…！！』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}Урю‐у! Энджи, Энджи‐е‐е‐е!{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): {p:0:『}Uryu-!! Ange, Angeeeeee...!!{p:0:』}

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "Ange-sama, no...! You mustn't provoke them...!! You should at least make it seem like you're going along with them, so you can buy some time...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Ange‐sama, no...! You mustn't provoke these guys...!! You should at least make it seem like you're going along with them, so you can buy some time...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「縁寿さま、ダメ…！　こいつらを挑発しちゃ駄目です…！！ここは表向きだけでも、調子を合わせて時間を稼ぐべきです…！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「縁寿さま、ダメ…！　こいつらを挑発しちゃ駄目です…！！　ここは表向きだけでも、調子を合わせて時間を稼ぐべきです…！」
Russian (RU): "Энджи‐сама, нет! Не провоцируйте их! Хотя бы подыграйте им, чтобы выиграть немного времени!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ange‐sama, não...! Você não devia provocar essa gente...!! Ao menos faça parecer que vai concordar com eles, para ganhar algum tempo...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「緣壽小姐，別…！別向這幫傢伙挑釁…！！此刻至少在表面上，應該去順著他們，拖延時間…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「缘寿小姐，别…！别向这帮家伙挑衅…！！此刻至少在表面上，应该去顺着他们，拖延时间…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ange-sama, no...! Non deve provocarli...!! Devi dare almeno l'impressione di essere d'accordo con loro, in modo da poter prendere tempo...!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): ".........They do say... you should throw your foolish pride... out with the garbage..."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........They do say...that you should throw your foolish pride...out with the garbage......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………下らないプライドは、…燃えないゴミの日に出しとけって、…よく言うわね……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………下らないプライドは、…燃えないゴミの日に出しとけって、…よく言うわね……」
Russian (RU): ".........Частенько поговаривают, что свою глупую гордость надо выбрасывать вместе с мусором..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Eles disseram...que você deveria jogar seu tolo orgulho...fora, junto com o lixo......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………常言道，…無聊的自尊，…就在不可燃垃圾日扔掉呢……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………常言道，…无聊的自尊，…就在不可燃垃圾日扔掉呢……」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Dicono spesso che... dovresti gettare via quell'inutile orgoglio... insieme alla spazzatura..."

Speaker: Sakutarou
Steam (ST): ‘Oh, what about Amakusa-san...?! If Amakusa-san comes, I'm sure...!’
Umineko Project (UP): ‘Wh‐what about Amakusa‐san...?! If Amakusa‐san comes, I just know he'll......!’
PC Japanese (JP): 『あ、天草さんは…？！天草さんが来てくれれば、きっと……！』
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『あ、天草さんは…？！　天草さんが来てくれれば、きっと……！』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}О, Амакуса‐сан? Если Амакуса‐сан придёт, я уверен!..{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘E‐E o Amakusa‐san...?! Se o Amakusa‐san vier, eu sei que ele......!’
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『啊，天草先生呢…？！只要天草先生來了，就一定能……！』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『啊，天草先生呢…？！只要天草先生来了，就一定能……！』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): {p:0:『}Oh, Amakusa-san...?! Se arrivasse Amakusa-san, sono sicuro che...!{p:0:』}

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "...It's no use, I can't see him... ...You idiot, Ange-sama...! Why did you leave Amakusa behind...?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "......No, it's no good, I can't see him... ......You idiot, Ange‐sama...! Why did you come without Amakusa...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……駄目、あいつの姿は見えないわ…。……縁寿さまの馬鹿…！　どうして天草を置いて来たんです…！」
Russian (RU): ".....Нет, я не вижу его... .....Вы дура, Энджи‐сама!.. Почему вы пошли без Амакусы?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Não adianta, eu não consigo vê‐lo... ......Ange‐sama, sua idiota...! Por que veio sem o Amakusa...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……不行，看不到他的影子…。……緣壽小姐真笨…！幹嘛把天草扔下不帶來…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……不行，看不到他的影子…。……缘寿小姐真笨…！干嘛把天草扔下不带来…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... No, non riesco a vederlo... Ange-sama, stupida...! Perché è venuta senza Amakusa...!"

Steam (ST): I didn't need Mammon to tell me. ...I was seriously regretting it already.
Umineko Project (UP): I don't need you to tell me that, Mammon.{n}......I'm already right in the middle of regretting it.
PC Japanese (JP): マモンに言われるまでもない。……今、まさに後悔の真っ最中だ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): マモンに言われるまでもない。{n}……今、まさに後悔の真っ最中だ。
Russian (RU): Мне не нужны слова Мамона.{n}К тому времени я уже как раз сожалела об этом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Você não precisa me dizer isso, Mammon.{n}......Eu já estou quase me arrependendo disso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 都用不著馬蒙說。{n}……此刻，我就正在為此追悔莫及。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 都用不着马蒙说。{n}……此刻，我就正在为此追悔莫及。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non c'è bisogno che me lo dica Mammon. ... In quel momento, me ne stavo giusto pentendo.

Steam (ST): I walked a long way. The forest was very thick. ...I've got no doubts that signs of activity here won't reach the boat...
Umineko Project (UP): I walked a long way to get here. The forest was very thick.{n}......There's no way that the disturbance here will reach the boat......
PC Japanese (JP): だいぶ歩いた。森もかなり深かった。……ここでの騒ぎは絶対に船まで届かないだろう……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だいぶ歩いた。森もかなり深かった。{n}……ここでの騒ぎは絶対に船まで届かないだろう……。
Russian (RU): Я проделала длинный путь. Лес был очень дремуч.{n}Я также знаю, что шум отсюда не достигнет катера...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu caminhei um longo caminho até aqui. A floresta é bem densa.{n}......Não tem como o barulho daqui chegar até o barco......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 走了好多路。森林也相當的深。{n}……這裡的吵鬧聲，是絕對傳不到船上的吧……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 走了好多路。森林也相当的深。{n}……这里的吵闹声，是绝对传不到船上的吧……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ho camminato per un bel po'. La foresta era davvero fitta. ... Non ho dubbi che il casino qui non raggiungerà la barca...

Steam (ST): During the time it took for Kasumi to finish casually smoking a whole cigarette, I was continuously tormented by the black-suits, as she had told them to.
Umineko Project (UP): As Kasumi took her sweet time smoking that single cigarette down to the filter, I was continuously laid into by the black‐suits however they deemed fit.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は、霞が煙草一本を、のんびり丸々吸い終えるまでの間、いいように黒服どもにいたぶられ続ける。
Russian (RU): И пока Касуми не спеша не выкурила сигарету, амбалы в чёрных костюмах, следуя её приказу, продолжали охаживать меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto Kasumi relaxadamente passava seu tempo fumando seu cigarro até o fim, eu continuei a ser atormentada pelos homens de terno preto, conforme ela dava ordens.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在霞悠哉悠哉地抽完一整根煙前的那段時間裡，我被黑衣人們盡情地痛揍。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在霞悠哉悠哉地抽完一整根烟前的那段时间里，我被黑衣人们尽情地痛揍。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mentre Kasumi fumava una sigaretta, ero continuamente tormentata dai tizi in nero, come era stato ordinato loro.

Steam (ST): The moment I grabbed at my head, my scalp was kicked by someone at a bad angle, and my head was filled with stars... The feeling of stars flickering in this gray, twisted world... was one I remembered clearly.
Umineko Project (UP): The moment I grabbed my head to protect it, the top of my head was kicked by someone at a bad angle, and my head filled with stars......{n}This feeling of stars flickering in a world twisted with gray......was one I knew well.
PC Japanese (JP): 頭を抱えた拍子に、悪い形で誰かに頭の天辺を蹴られ、頭の中に星がいっぱいに広がった……。この灰色に歪んだぐにゃぐにゃの世界に星がちらつく感じ、……私はよく覚えてる。
Russian (RU): Как только я схватилась за голову, мне ударили по ней под нехорошим углом, отчего она наполнилась звёздами...{n}Ощущение звёзд, мерцающих в этом искажённым серым мире, было мне хорошо знакомо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No momento em que coloquei as mãos na cabeça para me proteger, a parte de cima da minha cabeça foi chutada em um ângulo ruim, preenchendo ela com estrelas......{n}Esse sentimento de estrelas cintilando em um mundo distorcido pelo cinza......era algo que eu conhecia bem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 剛抱住腦袋，就扎扎實實地被某人踢中了頭頂，腦中冒出了一大片星星……。我清楚地記得，……這種星星閃爍在灰色的歪歪扭扭的世界中的感覺。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 刚抱住脑袋，就扎扎实实地被某人踢中了头顶，脑中冒出了一大片星星……。我清楚地记得，……这种星星闪烁在灰色的歪歪扭扭的世界中的感觉。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nel momento in cui mi toccai la testa, fui presa a calci in un fianco, e vidi per un momento le stelle... una sensazione del genere... la conoscevo bene.

Steam (ST): My life was very similar to the one Sumadera Kasumi led.
Umineko Project (UP): My life was very similar to the one Sumadera Kasumi led.
PC Japanese (JP): 私も、須磨寺霞と辿った人生はよく似ていた。
Russian (RU): Моя жизнь очень походила на жизнь, которую вела Сумадера Касуми.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Minha vida foi muito similar a vida que Sumadera Kasumi levou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我與須磨寺霞所走過的人生很是相似。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我与须磨寺霞所走过的人生很是相似。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La mia vita era molto simile a quella che ha avuto Sumadera Kasumi.

Steam (ST): ...After all, as the Successor to the Ushiromiya family, I was tormented constantly with various kinds of bullying...under the guise of education and training.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Because I was tormented constantly with all kinds of bullying under the guise of education and training, to make me a worthy "successor to the Ushiromiya family".
PC Japanese (JP): 右代宮家の跡継ぎらしくあれと、教育や躾と称した様々ないじめに、ずっと苛まれてきたからだ。
Russian (RU): Поскольку я являлась наследницей семьи Уширомия, я подвергалась всяческим нападкам, замаскированным под обучение и тренировки.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Porque eu fui atormentada constantemente com todos os tipos de bullying sobre o pretexto de educação e treinamento, para fazer de mim alguém digna de "suceder a família Ushiromiya".
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “要有右代宮家繼承人的樣子”，我也一直在受著這類聲稱是教育與管教的種種欺凌、折磨。
Chinese Simplified (CN): “要有右代宫家继承人的样子”，我也一直在受着这类声称是教育与管教的种种欺凌、折磨。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Poiché, come erede della famiglia Ushiromiya, sono stata tormentata continuamente con l'educazione e l'allenamento.

Steam (ST): Yes. Having the inside of my head filled with stars like this...is a feeling I know well.
Umineko Project (UP): Yes. Having the inside of my head filled with stars like this...is a feeling I know well.
PC Japanese (JP): そう。こんな感じで頭の中に星がいっぱい散らばる感じを、よく覚えてる。
Russian (RU): Да. То, как голова заполняется такими звёздами... Я очень хорошо знаю это чувство.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sim. Ter o interior da minha cabeça preenchido por estrelas como essas...é um sentimento que eu conheço bem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對。我清楚地記得，這種腦中金星四濺的感覺。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对。我清楚地记得，这种脑中金星四溅的感觉。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Già. Avere una simile confusione in testa... è una sensazione che conoscevo bene.

Steam (ST): When being reprimanded for some error in manners I seemed to have made, the discussion always turned to whether I was fitting to be the Successor or not.
Umineko Project (UP): When being reprimanded for some error in manners I seemed to have made, the lecture always turned to whether I was fitting to be the successor to the Ushiromiya family or not.
PC Japanese (JP): 私が間違えたらしい何かのマナーについての叱責は、いつものように、右代宮家の次期当主として相応しいだの相応しくないだのという話になり。
Russian (RU): Когда мне делали выговор за какую‐то допущенную в манерах оплошность, обсуждение всегда сводилось к тому, достойна ли я или нет быть наследницей семьи Уширомия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando eu era reprimida por algum erro de conduta, os sermões eram sempre sobre se eu era capacitada para suceder a família Ushiromiya ou não.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 關於我貌似有做錯的禮儀問題的斥責，總是會變成大談特談，與右代宮家下任當主的身份相不相稱。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 关于我貌似有做错的礼仪问题的斥责，总是会变成大谈特谈，与右代宫家下任当主的身份相不相称。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando venivo sgridata per un errore che avevo commesso, la discussione si spostava sempre sul mio essere in grado di essere erede della famiglia Ushiromiya oppure no.

Steam (ST): ...On and on about the honor of the Ushiromiya family, and how deep that was.
Umineko Project (UP): ......On and on about the honor of the Ushiromiya family, and how important it was.
PC Japanese (JP): ……右代宮家の名誉だの何だの、その重みがどうこうどうこう。
Russian (RU): И вот так постоянно о чести семьи Уширомия и насколько она важна.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Sobre a honra da família Ushiromiya, e o quão importante isso era.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……右代宮家的榮耀如何如何，其分量怎麼怎麼樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……右代宫家的荣耀如何如何，其分量怎么怎么样。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Sempre sull'onore della famiglia Ushiromiya e di quanto fosse importante.

Steam (ST): ...By the time the conversation reached that point, I'd forget what mistake I was being blamed for in the first place.
Umineko Project (UP): ......By the time her rant reached that point, I would forget what mistake I was being blamed for in the first place.
PC Japanese (JP): ……そういう話にまで至るころには、そもそも私が、何の失敗をして咎められているのか、それすらもわからなくなってしまう。
Russian (RU): ......К тому времени, как разговор достигал этой точки, я уже успевала забыть, за какую ошибку меня отчитывали.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Quando a conversa chegava nesse ponto, eu já havia esquecido por qual erro eu estava sendo culpada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……一聽她說起這些，我就會連自己到底是因犯了什麼錯而受斥責的都搞不懂了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……一听她说起这些，我就会连自己到底是因犯了什么错而受斥责的都搞不懂了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quando la conversazione raggiungeva quel punto, avrei dimenticato per cosa mi stavano sgridando all'inizio.

Steam (ST): No, in fact, it was the same for Aunt Eva.
Umineko Project (UP): No, actually, it was the same way for Aunt Eva too.
PC Japanese (JP): いや、実際、絵羽伯母さんもそうだった。
Russian (RU): Более того, то же самое происходило и с тётей Евой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não, na verdade, era o mesmo com a tia Eva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 實際上，繪羽姑母自己也是如此。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 实际上，绘羽姑母自己也是如此。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): No, in realtà era lo stesso anche per Eva oba-san.

Steam (ST): After all, sometimes she'd ask herself "Umm, what was it again?"
Umineko Project (UP): After all, sometimes she would ask herself "Umm, what was I saying again?"
PC Japanese (JP): だって時折、「えぇと、それで何だったっけ？」と、自問していたから。
Russian (RU): Потому что иногда она спрашивала себя: "М‐м‐м, так о чём шла речь?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Muitas vezes ela se perguntava "Então, o que eu estava dizendo mesmo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為，時常能聽到她自問「那個，是什麼事來著？」。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为，时常能听到她自问「那个，是什么事来着？」。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopotutto, a volte, lei stessa si chiedeva “Umm, di cosa parlavamo?”

Steam (ST): ...But in the end, she wouldn't be able to remember, and would say something like...
Umineko Project (UP): ...But in the end, she wouldn't be able to remember, and would say something like:
PC Japanese (JP): …でも結局、それは思いだせず、
Russian (RU): Но в итоге у неё так и не получалось вспомнить, и она говорила что‐нибудь вроде:
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Mas no fim, ela não era capaz de lembrar, e dizia algo como:
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …不過結果，她並沒有想起來，而是轉而用起像，
Chinese Simplified (CN): …不过结果，她并没有想起来，而是转而用起像，
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma alla fine, non essendo in grado di ricordarselo, direbbe qualcosa del genere:

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "If I'm angry, it must be your fault, Ange. The fact that you're at fault is what matters, so who cares if I can't remember what it was you did."
Umineko Project (UP): "The fact that I'm angry must mean that you did something wrong. So whatever wrong thing you did is the problem, and it isn't important that I can't remember what it was any more."
PC Japanese (JP): 「私が怒っているということは、きっと縁寿が何か悪いことをしたのだろう。なら、その悪いことが問題なのであって、何をしたかなんて、今さら思い出せなくても問題ない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私が怒っているということは、きっと縁寿が何か悪いことをしたのだろう。なら、その悪いことが問題なのであって、何をしたかなんて、今さら思い出せなくても問題ない」
Russian (RU): "Ты, должно быть, сделала что‐то не так, Энджи, потому я и сержусь. Так что главным является твой проступок, а что он собой представляет, значения не имеет."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O fato de eu estar zangada deve ser porque você fez algo de errado. Então, seja o que for que você tenha feito, esse é o problema, por isso, não importa se eu não consiga me lembrar o que era."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我在發火就代表著，一定是緣壽做了什麼不對的事。那麼，問題就在於緣壽做了錯事，至於做了什麼，就算現在想不起來，也沒問題。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我在发火就代表着，一定是缘寿做了什么不对的事。那么，问题就在于缘寿做了错事，至于做了什么，就算现在想不起来，也没问题。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "La ragione per cui sono arrabbiata deve essere perché hai fatto qualcosa di sbagliato, Ange. Quindi il problema è cosa tu abbia fatto di sbagliato, e non il fatto che non te lo ricordi."

Steam (ST): ...There'd be some ridiculous reasoning like that, and then she'd keep on punishing me.
Umineko Project (UP): ...There'd be some ridiculous reasoning like that, and then she would continue punishing me.
PC Japanese (JP): …みたいなすごい理論になって、私への罰は続けられたから。
Russian (RU): И следуя такой извращённой логике, она продолжала наказывать меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Tinha alguns raciocínios ridículos como esse, e ela continuava a me punir.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …的無敵理論，繼續責罰我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …的无敌理论，继续责罚我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ci sarebbe stato un ragionamento ridicolo del genere, e poi avrebbe continuato a sgridarmi.

Steam (ST): Yes. Aunt Eva's punishment wasn't something that would continue until I learned something, or acknowledged my mistake, or apologized.
Umineko Project (UP): Yes. Aunt Eva's punishments weren't something that would continue until I learned something, or acknowledged my mistake, or apologized.
PC Japanese (JP): そう。絵羽伯母さんの罰は、私が何かを学ぶか、誤りを認めるか、謝罪するかまで続けられるのではない。
Russian (RU): Да. Наказания тёти Евы продолжались не до тех пор, пока я что‐нибудь уясню, признаю свою ошибку и извинюсь...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sim. As punições da tia Eva não eram algo que continuavam até que eu aprendesse, reconhecesse meu erro, ou pedisse desculpas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對。繪羽姑母的責罰，並不是要罰到我學到什麼呀，承認錯誤呀，賠禮道歉呀。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对。绘羽姑母的责罚，并不是要罚到我学到什么呀，承认错误呀，赔礼道歉呀。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sì. Le punizioni di Eva oba-san non erano un qualcosa che si sarebbero fermate dopo che io avessi imparato qualcosa, riconosciuto il mio sbaglio, o mi fossi scusata.

Steam (ST): ......It would continue until Aunt Eva wanted to stop. So this violence was a bit nostalgic, in a way that made me want to vomit.
Umineko Project (UP): .........They would continue until Aunt Eva wanted to stop.{n}So even this violence was a bit nostalgic, in a way that made me want to vomit.
PC Japanese (JP): ………絵羽伯母さんが、止めたいと思うまで続くのだ。だから、こんな暴力だって、反吐が出る意味で、懐かしい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ………絵羽伯母さんが、止めたいと思うまで続くのだ。{n}だから、こんな暴力だって、反吐が出る意味で、懐かしい。
Russian (RU): А до тех пор, пока она сама не захочет остановиться.{n}Поэтому творимое надо мной насилие вызвало во мне лёгкую ностальгию, от чего мне тотчас стало тошно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Elas iriam continuar até ela decidir parar.{n}Mesmo essa violência era um pouco nostálgica, de uma forma que fazia eu querer vomitar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………而是要罰到繪羽姑母自己想罷休。{n}所以，對這種暴力，我以反胃的意義感到懷念。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………而是要罚到绘羽姑母自己想罢休。{n}所以，对这种暴力，我以反胃的意义感到怀念。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Sarebbero continuate finché Eva oba-san non si fosse fermata. Quindi questa violenza mi portava un po' di nostalgia, quasi da farmi vomitare.

Steam (ST): ...I opened my eyes...and look, there's Aunt Eva.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I opened my eyes, ......and oh look, there's Aunt Eva.
PC Japanese (JP): ……目を開ければ、……ほら、そこに絵羽伯母さんがいる。
Russian (RU): Я открыла глаза и... Гляньте‐ка, вот же тётя Ева.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu abri meus olhos, ......e, oh, veja, lá está a tia Eva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……睜開眼睛時，……瞧，繪羽姑母就在那。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……睁开眼睛时，……瞧，绘羽姑母就在那。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Apro i miei occhi... e guarda, c'è Eva oba-san.

Steam (ST): Right next to Kasumi, who's smoking a cigarette, I can see Aunt Eva, almost as though the two of them are laughing together.
Umineko Project (UP): Right next to Kasumi, who was smoking her cigarette, I could see Aunt Eva, the two of them looking almost as though they were laughing at me together.
PC Japanese (JP): 煙草を吸いながら、私を嘲笑う霞のすぐ隣に、まるで一緒に笑っているかのように、絵羽伯母さんの姿が見えた。
Russian (RU): Прямо рядом с Касуми, курящей сигарету. Они даже словно почти смеются в унисон.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Bem ao lado da Kasumi, que estava fumando seu cigarro, eu podia ver a tia Eva, as duas pareciam estar rindo de mim, juntas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我看到了，在邊抽煙，邊嘲笑我的霞身邊的，簡直就像是在跟她一起大笑的，繪羽姑母。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我看到了，在边抽烟，边嘲笑我的霞身边的，简直就像是在跟她一起大笑的，绘羽姑母。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Proprio al fianco di Kasumi, che sta fumando una sigaretta, posso vedere Eva oba-san, come se entrambe stessero ridendo insieme.

Steam (ST): When I think about it, even Aunt Eva's life might be a thing worthy of my sympathy.
Umineko Project (UP): When I think about it, even Aunt Eva's life might be worthy of sympathy.
PC Japanese (JP): 思えば、絵羽伯母さんの人生も、同情に値するものなのかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Если задуматься, даже жизнь тёти Евы заслуживает толику моего сочувствия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando eu penso sobre isso, até mesmo a vida da tia Eva poderia ser digna de simpatia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 想來，繪羽姑母的人生，或許也值得同情吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 想来，绘羽姑母的人生，或许也值得同情吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando ci penso, anche la vita di Eva oba-san potrebbe essere degna della mia pietà.

Steam (ST): ...The responsibility and pressure of being a member of the Ushiromiya family, which she often mentioned to me, had probably caused her great pain.
Umineko Project (UP): ......The responsibilities and pressures of members of the Ushiromiya family, which she had so often mentioned to me, were all things that she herself had suffered.
PC Japanese (JP): ……あいつが私に口にしてきた、右代宮家の人間としての責任や重圧は、全て自らが苦しんできたことなのだ。
Russian (RU): Ответственность и давление, с которыми приходилось иметь дело члену семьи Уширомия, и о которых она мне часто напоминала, наверняка доставляли ей сильную боль.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......As responsabilidades e pressão dos membros da família Ushiromiya, que ela também havia mencionado para mim, eram todas coisas que ela mesma havia sofrido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……她老跟我講的，身為右代宮家一員的責任與重壓，全都是她自己吃過的苦頭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……她老跟我讲的，身为右代宫家一员的责任与重压，全都是她自己吃过的苦头。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... La responsabilità e la pressione come membro della famiglia Ushiromiya, che mi ha spesso menzionato, le hanno probabilmente causato un gran dolore.

Steam (ST): After all, people can't make insults that they've never been the targets of themselves...
Umineko Project (UP): Because people cannot voice insults that they have never been subjected to themselves......
PC Japanese (JP): 人は、自らに浴びせられた悪口しか、口に出来ないのだから……。
Russian (RU): Потому что люди не могут озвучить оскорбления, которым не подвергались сами...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porque as pessoas não são capazes de reproduzir insultos que elas mesmas nunca sofreram......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 畢竟，人只會說出自己遭受過的惡言……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 毕竟，人只会说出自己遭受过的恶言……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perché le persone non possono lanciare insulti con cui non sono mai stati colpiti...

Steam (ST): It was probably the same for Aunt Rosa as well. ...As the youngest child of the honorable Ushiromiya family, she must've gone through many tough times.
Umineko Project (UP): It was probably the same way for Aunt Rosa as well.{n}......As the youngest child of the glorious Ushiromiya family, she must have gone through many tough times.
PC Japanese (JP): それは多分、楼座叔母さんも同じだったろう。……栄光ある右代宮家の末っ子として、色々と辛い目にあってきたに違いない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それは多分、楼座叔母さんも同じだったろう。{n}……栄光ある右代宮家の末っ子として、色々と辛い目にあってきたに違いない。
Russian (RU): Точно так же, наверное, было и с тётей Розой.{n}Как самому младшему отпрыску достославной семьи Уширомия, ей наверняка пришлось хлебнуть горя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Provavelmente o mesmo valia para a tia Rosa.{n}......Como filha mais nova da gloriosa família Ushiromiya, ela deve ter passado por muitas coisas difíceis.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 多半，樓座姑母也一樣吧。{n}……身為榮光顯赫的右代宮家的小女兒，她無疑受了不少罪。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 多半，楼座姑母也一样吧。{n}……身为荣光显赫的右代宫家的小女儿，她无疑受了不少罪。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Probabilmente è stato lo stesso anche per Rosa oba-san. ... Come figlia più giovane dell'onorevole famiglia Ushiromiya, deve essere stata dura.

Steam (ST): So, it was just like what Aunt Eva did to me... Just like what Sumadera Kasumi is doing now... ...Aunt Rosa...must have been the same.
Umineko Project (UP): So, just as Aunt Eva acted towards me...{n}And just as Sumadera Kasumi is acting right now...{n}......Aunt Rosa must also...have been the same.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、絵羽伯母さんが私に対してそうであったように。そしてまさに今、須磨寺霞がそうであるように。……楼座叔母さんもまた、…そうであったに違いない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だから、絵羽伯母さんが私に対してそうであったように。{n}そしてまさに今、須磨寺霞がそうであるように。{n}……楼座叔母さんもまた、…そうであったに違いない。
Russian (RU): Поэтому точно так же, как тётя Ева вела себя по отношению ко мне...{n}И точно так же, как Сумадера Касуми ведёт себя сейчас...{n}Тётя Роза наверняка... была такой же.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, assim como a tia Eva agia diante de mim...{n}E assim como Sumadera Kasumi está agindo agora...{n}......A tia Rosa também...deve ter sido o mesmo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，就像繪羽姑母對我做的那樣。{n}就像此刻的須磨寺霞正在做的那樣。{n}……樓座姑母，…也無疑是一樣的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，就像绘羽姑母对我做的那样。{n}就像此刻的须磨寺霞正在做的那样。{n}……楼座姑母，…也无疑是一样的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi, come si comportava Eva oba-san... così si comporta ora Sumadera Kasumi... Anche Rosa oba-san... deve aver passato lo stesso.

Steam (ST): People tend to push the pain they're burdened with onto other people. Otherwise, they can never escape from that pain.
Umineko Project (UP): People push the suffering they have been made to bear onto other people.{n}Otherwise, they can never escape from it.
PC Japanese (JP): 人は、背負わされた苦しみを誰かに押し付ける。そうしなければ、いつまでもその苦しみから逃れられないのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 人は、背負わされた苦しみを誰かに押し付ける。{n}そうしなければ、いつまでもその苦しみから逃れられないのだ。
Russian (RU): Люди склонны перекладывать тяжкую ношу своей боли на плечи других людей.{n}Иначе им не сбежать от этой боли.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As pessoas jogam nos outros os sofrimentos que elas tiveram que suportar.{n}Caso contrário, elas nunca vão conseguir escapar deles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 人會將自己背負的苦難推給他人。{n}若不這麼做，就永遠都擺脫不了這份苦難。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 人会将自己背负的苦难推给他人。{n}若不这么做，就永远都摆脱不了这份苦难。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le persone tendono a scaricare sugli altri il loro dolore. Altrimenti, non sarebbero mai in grado di sfuggirvi.

Steam (ST): ...So on and on, in eternity and perpetuity, the chain of pain and sadness does not end.
Umineko Project (UP): ......So on and on, in eternity and perpetuity, the chain of suffering and sadness never ends.
PC Japanese (JP): ……そうして延々と、永久に永遠に、苦しみと悲しみの連鎖が、終わらない。
Russian (RU): И поэтому вечно и непрерывно страдание передаётся от человека к человеку, становясь глубже, как море, отходящее от берегов, и эта порочная цепь всё никак не рвётся.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......E, por isso, eterna e perpetuamente, a corrente de sofrimento e tristeza nunca tem fim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……就像這樣，一環接一環，永久永遠，苦難與悲傷的連鎖永遠不會終結。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……就像这样，一环接一环，永久永远，苦难与悲伤的连锁永远不会终结。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quindi per tutta l'eternità quella catena di tristezza e dolore non terminerà.

Steam (ST): That is the reason............Maria onee‐chan's magic was... so incredible.
Umineko Project (UP): That is the reason............Maria onee‐chan's magic was......so incredible.
PC Japanese (JP): だからこそ、…………真里亞お姉ちゃんの魔法は、……すごかったのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だからこそ、…………真里亞お姉ちゃんの魔法は、……すごかったのだ。
Russian (RU): Вот почему магия Марии онее‐чан столь невероятна.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esse é o motivo pelo qual............a magia da Maria onee‐chan era......tão incrível.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以說，…………真里亞姐姐的魔法，……好厲害。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以说，…………真里亚姐姐的魔法，……好厉害。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questo è il motivo... per cui la magia di Maria Onee-chan... è così incredibile.

Steam (ST): With her magic, ...she didn't have to bear the pain caused by Aunt Rosa.
Umineko Project (UP): With her magic, ......she did not have to bear the suffering from Aunt Rosa.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女はその魔法で、……楼座叔母さんからの苦しみを、背負わなかった。
Russian (RU): Благодаря своей магии ей не приходилось нести не себе бремя боли, причиняемой тётей Розой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com a magia dela, ......ela não precisava suportar o sofrimento que vinha da tia Rosa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她通過這個魔法，……沒有背上樓座姑母帶給她的苦難。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她通过这个魔法，……没有背上楼座姑母带给她的苦难。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Con la sua magia... non ha dovuto sopportare il dolore causato da Rosa oba-san.

Steam (ST): The pain probably was pushed onto her. Its weight probably tormented her.
Umineko Project (UP): That pain was probably pushed onto her.{n}Its weight probably tormented her.
PC Japanese (JP): 押し付けられはしただろう。彼女をその重みで苦しめはしただろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 押し付けられはしただろう。{n}彼女をその重みで苦しめはしただろう。
Russian (RU): Ту боль наверняка взваливали на неё.{n}Тяжесть этой боли наверняка угнетала её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A dor provavelmente era passada para ela.{n}Seu peso provavelmente a atormentava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她曾被強加過苦難吧。{n}她是被這份沉重，壓得很難受吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她曾被强加过苦难吧。{n}她是被这份沉重，压得很难受吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quel dolore probabilmente è stato scaricato su di lei. Era sicuramente schiacciata dal suo peso.

Steam (ST): ...But Onee-chan didn't carry that burden on her own shoulders.
Umineko Project (UP): ......But Onee‐chan did not carry that burden on her own shoulders.
PC Japanese (JP): ……でも、お姉ちゃんはそれを自らの肩には背負わなかった。
Russian (RU): Но она не несла это бремя на своих плечах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .....Mas a onee‐chan não carregava esse peso em seus ombros.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……但是，姐姐沒有將此背到自己的肩上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……但是，姐姐没有将此背到自己的肩上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma Onee-chan non reggeva quel fardello sulle sue spalle.

Steam (ST): ......She purified it...and filled her world with happiness.
Umineko Project (UP): .........She exorcised it...and filled her world with happiness.
PC Japanese (JP): ………それを綺麗に祓い、世界を幸せで満たした。
Russian (RU): Она очистила ту боль и наполнила свой мир счастьем.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Ela o exorcizava...e preenchia seu mundo com felicidade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………而是將此全部拔除，以幸福注滿了世界。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………而是将此全部拔除，以幸福注满了世界。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Lo aveva purificato... riempiendo il suo mondo di felicità.

Steam (ST): So I'm sure... ...If Maria onee-chan had had children in the future...
Umineko Project (UP): So, I'm sure......that even if Maria onee‐chan had had children in the future...
PC Japanese (JP): だからきっと。……真里亞お姉ちゃんが将来、子どもを持っても。
Russian (RU): Поэтому, вне всяких сомнений...Если бы в будущем у Марии онее‐чан появились дети...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, eu tenho certeza que......mesmo que no futuro em que a Maria onee‐chan tivesse um filho...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以。……就算真里亞姐姐在將來有了孩子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以。……就算真里亚姐姐在将来有了孩子。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi, di sicuro... anche se Maria Onee-chan avesse avuto bambini in futuro...

Steam (ST): She probably wouldn't have pushed the pain that had been forced on her onto her children.
Umineko Project (UP): ...she would never have pushed the suffering forced down through the generations onto them.
PC Japanese (JP): その子どもに代々押し付けられてきた苦しみを押し付けることはないだろう。
Russian (RU): Она бы ни за что не взвалила на их плечи ту боль, которую когда‐то взвалили на неё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...ela nunca iria jogar esse sofrimento forçado nas gerações seguintes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她也一定不會將這一代代硬推下來的苦難，強加到她孩子的頭上吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她也一定不会将这一代代硬推下来的苦难，强加到她孩子的头上吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non avrebbe scaricato su di loro la sofferenza che era stata a sua volta scaricata su di lei.

Steam (ST): ...That chain of pain and sadness that stretched back for who knows how long, which she couldn't understand and which she had inherited, which had been forced onto her... ......Maria onee-chan cut it with her magic.
Umineko Project (UP): ......The chain of suffering and sadness, which had been inherited by and forced upon each generation for who knows how long, .........was, by Maria onee‐chan's magic, broken.
PC Japanese (JP): ……一体、どれほどの長きにわたって受け継がれ、押し付けられてきたかわからない苦しみと悲しみの連鎖を、………真里亞お姉ちゃんの魔法は、断ち切ったのだ。
Russian (RU): Эта порочная цепь из боли и горя была такой длинной, что казалось, будто у неё нет начала и не видать ей конца. И Мария онее‐чан не понимала её и была вынуждена унаследовать её против своей воли. Однако своей магией она... смогла разорвать эту цепь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......A corrente de sofrimento e tristeza, que havia sido herdada e forçada sobre gerações por sabe se lá quantos anos, .........foi quebrada pela magia da Maria onee‐chan.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……真里亞姐姐的魔法，斬斷了，不知究竟傳承了、推來推去了多久多久的，………苦難與悲傷的連鎖。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……真里亚姐姐的魔法，斩断了，不知究竟传承了、推来推去了多久多久的，………苦难与悲伤的连锁。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quelle catene di dolore e tristezza che si erano estese per così tanto tempo, che lei non capiva e che eppure aveva ereditato, che erano state affidate a lei... Maria Onee-chan le aveva spezzate con la sua magia.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "......Whaaat's wrong? Got a bone to pick with me?"
Umineko Project (UP): "............What is it? Do you have something to complain to me about?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………なぁに？　私に何か文句でもあるのぅ？」
Russian (RU): "......Что такое? Ты чем‐то недовольна?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............O que foi? Tem alguma coisa para reclamar comigo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………怎麼？你對我是有什麼意見嗎？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………怎么？你对我是有什么意见吗？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Cosa sarebbe questo? Hai qualcosa di cui lamentarti con me?"

Steam (ST): In the past, I would have snapped back. ...I would've met her hatred with hatred, so that they'd cancel each other out.
Umineko Project (UP): In the past, I would have snapped back.{n}......And cancelled out her hatred with hatred of my own.
PC Japanese (JP): かつての私なら、その売り言葉に買い言葉を返した。……そして彼女の憎しみに対し、私も憎しみをぶつけて相殺してきた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): かつての私なら、その売り言葉に買い言葉を返した。{n}……そして彼女の憎しみに対し、私も憎しみをぶつけて相殺してきた。
Russian (RU): В прошлом я бы сорвалась в ответ.{n}И я уравновешивала её, отвечая на её ненависть своей собственной ненавистью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No passado, eu teria retrucado essas palavras inflamatórias.{n}......E teria cancelado o ódio dela confrontando‐o com o meu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 若是以前的我，就會對這話以眼還眼，以牙還牙了。{n}……對於她的憎恨，我也同樣還以憎恨地與其相抵消。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 若是以前的我，就会对这话以眼还眼，以牙还牙了。{n}……对于她的憎恨，我也同样还以憎恨地与其相抵消。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In passato, avrei ribattuto. ... E avrei bilanciato la situazione, rispondendo al suo odio col mio odio.

Steam (ST): ...No, nothing got cancelled out. The thing being forced on me ended up right there on my shoulders.
Umineko Project (UP): ...No, I cancelled out nothing. The weight of that which had been forced onto her bears down hard on my shoulders as well.
PC Japanese (JP): …いや、相殺はしていない。しっかりと、私の肩にも、その押し付けられたものは背負わされている。
Russian (RU): Нет, неверно, никакого уравновешивания не было и в помине. Мне пришлось нести на своих плечах ношу, которую когда‐то против её воли взвалили на неё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Não, eu não teria cancelado nada. O peso daquilo que foi forçado sobre ela acabou sendo direcionado também sobre os meus ombros.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …不，沒有抵消。我的肩上也的的確確地，背上了她強加給我的東西。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …不，没有抵消。我的肩上也的的确确地，背上了她强加给我的东西。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... No, non avrei bilanciato nulla. Avrei solo preso sulle mie spalle ciò che era stato scaricato su di lei.

Steam (ST): Just like how even now, ...I hate her.
Umineko Project (UP): After all, even now, ......I hate her.
PC Japanese (JP): 未だにこうして、……彼女を憎んでいるように。
Russian (RU): Даже сейчас я... ненавижу её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Afinal, mesmo agora, ......eu odeio ela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 至今還如這般地，……恨著她。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 至今还如这般地，……恨着她。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ad esempio come in questo momento... la odi.

Steam (ST): So, now that I... ...know of magic, ...I'll look at the human called Ushiromiya Eva again.
Umineko Project (UP): So, ............now that I knew of magic, ......I looked at the human called Ushiromiya Eva again.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、私は、…………魔法を知り、……右代宮絵羽という人間を、もう一度見る。
Russian (RU): Но теперь, когда я знаю о магии, я взгляну на человека по имени Уширомия Ева ещё раз.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, ............agora que eu conheço a magia, ......eu olhei para a humana chamada Ushiromiya Eva mais uma vez.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，…………懂得了魔法的我，……得重新審視一遍，右代宮繪羽這個人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，…………懂得了魔法的我，……得重新审视一遍，右代宫绘羽这个人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi, ora che... conosco la magia... guarderò di nuovo l'umano chiamato Ushiromiya Eva.

Steam (ST): ......What I could see through to... ...was a sad human form, no different from me, who had lost her family and who bore deep wounds in her heart.
Umineko Project (UP): .........What I could see through to......was the sad form of a human, no different from me, who had lost her family and who bore deep wounds in her heart.
PC Japanese (JP): ………そこに透けて見えたのは、……私と何も変わらない、家族を失い、心に深い傷を負った悲しい人間の姿だった。
Russian (RU): И глазам моим предстал... Отравленный печалью человек, ничем не отличающийся от меня, потерявший всю свою семью и мучимый глубокими ранами на своём сердце.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........O que eu podia ver através......era a forma de um humano triste, não diferente de mim, que perdeu sua família e suportava profundas feridas em seu coração.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………透過其表面所看到的，……乃是一個與我沒有任何不同的，失去了家人，遭受了深深心傷的可悲的人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………透过其表面所看到的，……乃是一个与我没有任何不同的，失去了家人，遭受了深深心伤的可悲的人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quello che ho potuto scorgere... era una triste figura umana, non diversa da me, che aveva perso la sua famiglia e che aveva una profonda cicatrice nel cuore.

Steam (ST): Unable to withstand the pain of that torn heart, she was doing nothing more than howl sadly, like a lion crying in pain, ...like a child.
Umineko Project (UP): Unable to withstand the pain of that torn heart, she was doing nothing except howling with a sad voice—like a lion crying in pain—like a child.
PC Japanese (JP): その裂けた心の傷の痛みに耐えかね、まるで苦痛に泣く獅子のように、子どものように、悲しい声で吼え猛っているだけなのだ。
Russian (RU): Будучи не в силах выносить боль разорванного сердца, всё, что она делала, так это выла грустным голосом, словно лев, голосящий от боли... как дитя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Incapaz de aguentar a dor que dilacerava seu coração, ela não fez nada mais exceto rugir como uma entristecida voz — como um leão chorando de dor — como uma criança.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 開著口子的心傷疼痛難忍，她也就只是在如因痛楚而哭泣的獅子、孩子般，以悲傷之聲聲嘶力竭地吼叫著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 开着口子的心伤疼痛难忍，她也就只是在如因痛楚而哭泣的狮子、孩子般，以悲伤之声声嘶力竭地吼叫着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Incapace di comprendere il dolore di quel cuore straziato, non faceva altro che urlare con voce triste, come un leone che urla di dolore... come un bambino.

Steam (ST): ...Even Ushiromiya Eva was someone I should have felt compassion for.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It turns out...Ushiromiya Eva was also a person deserving of compassion.
PC Japanese (JP): ……右代宮絵羽も、同情されるべき存在だったのだ。
Russian (RU): Уширомия Ева — человек, к которому мне следует испытывать сострадание.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Isso transformou...Ushiromiya Eva em uma pessoa digna de compaixão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……右代宮繪羽，也是一個應該獲得同情的存在。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……右代宫绘羽，也是一个应该获得同情的存在。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Anche Ushiromiya Eva è una persona che dovrei compatire.

Steam (ST): She needed someone to understand the difficulties and pain of her childhood years. ......Even she, who was the only survivor of the Rokkenjima crime, who was faced with the curiosity of all of society, who was publicly slandered and forced to have salt continually flung into the wound, had needed someone's compassion.
Umineko Project (UP): She had needed someone to understand the difficulties and pain of her childhood days, .........and she, too, as the only survivor of the Rokkenjima incident, who was faced with the inquisitive eyes of all of society, who was publicly slandered, who had salt continually rubbed into her wounds, ......had needed someone's compassion.
PC Japanese (JP): その辛く悲しい少女時代を誰かに理解され、………六軒島の事件をたった一人生き残り、世間の全てから好奇の目を向けられ、公然と中傷され、傷に塩を塗られ続けた彼女にも、……誰かの同情が必要だったのだ。
Russian (RU): Ей нужен был кто‐то способный понять сложности и боль её детства, и даже она, единственная, кто пережил преступление на Роккенджиме, ставшая объектом любопытства всего общества, подвергавшаяся публичному злословию и постоянному посыпанию соли на раны, нуждалась в чьём‐то сострадании.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela precisava de alguém para entender suas dificuldades e dores de sua infância, .........assim como, também por ser a única sobrevivente do incidente de Rokkenjima, que enfrentou os inquisitivos olhares de toda a sociedade, que foi caluniada publicamente, que continuamente continuou a esfregar sal em suas feridas, ......ela precisava da compaixão de alguém.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 其辛酸悲傷的少女時代需要某人的理解，………在六軒島的事件中獨自一人活了下來，被全社會的好奇目光所關注，被公然中傷，沒完沒了地被人往傷口撒鹽的她，……也需要著他人的同情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 其辛酸悲伤的少女时代需要某人的理解，………在六轩岛的事件中独自一人活了下来，被全社会的好奇目光所关注，被公然中伤，没完没了地被人往伤口撒盐的她，……也需要着他人的同情。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Aveva bisogno di qualcuno che capisse le difficoltà e il dolore della sua adolescenza... e anche lei, l'unica sopravvissuta del massacro di Rokkenjima, a cui era rivolta l'attenzione di tutta la società, che continuava a girare il coltello nella piaga, avrebbe avuto bisogno della compassione di qualcuno.

Steam (ST): In order to let Eva forget her pain and sadness at least a little, ......the black witch...taught her magic, just like the times it had possessed Aunt Rosa.
Umineko Project (UP): In order to let her forget her pain and sorrow for least a moment, ............the black witch, the very same that possessed Aunt Rosa, ......taught her magic.
PC Japanese (JP): その彼女の痛みと悲しみをわずかの間だけ忘れさせるために、…………楼座叔母さんに取り憑いたのと同じ、黒き魔女が、……魔法を教えたのだ。
Russian (RU): Чтобы позволить Еве хоть немного забыть свою боль и печаль, чёрная ведьма, вроде той, которой была одержима тётя Роза, научила её магии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A fim de esquecer sua dor e sofrimento por apenas um momento, ............a bruxa da escuridão, a mesma que possuiu a tia Rosa, ......ensinou a ela magia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這個她為了能一時忘記痛與悲，…………而跟與附體在樓座姑母身上的相同的黑魔女，……學了魔法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这个她为了能一时忘记痛与悲，…………而跟与附体在楼座姑母身上的相同的黑魔女，……学了魔法。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per far sì che Eva dimenticasse un po' il suo dolore e la sua tristezza... la strega nera, proprio come aveva posseduto con Rosa oba-san... le insegnò la sua magia.

Steam (ST): It was the same magic of anger and sadness... that {f:5:Beatrice} had taught Maria onee-chan when she was mourning for her torn-apart friend, Sakutarou.
Umineko Project (UP): It was the same magic of anger and sadness that {f:5:Beatrice} had taught Maria onee‐chan, when she was mourning for Sakutarou after he was torn apart.
PC Japanese (JP): それは、さくたろうを引き裂かれて嘆き悲しんだ真里亞お姉ちゃんに、ベアトリーチェが教えたのと同じ、怒りと悲しみの魔法。
Russian (RU): Это была та же магия гнева и грусти, которой {f:5:Беатриче} обучила Марию онее‐чан, когда та скорбела о своем разорванном друге Сакутаро.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era a mesma magia de raiva e tristeza que {f:5:Beatrice} havia ensinado para a Maria onee‐chan, quando ela estava lamentando a perda do Sakutarou depois que ele foi rasgado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那是跟，貝阿朵莉切教給在為櫻太郎被撕裂而憤慨悲傷的真里亞姐姐的相同的，憤怒與悲傷的魔法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那是跟，贝阿朵莉切教给在为樱太郎被撕裂而愤慨悲伤的真里亚姐姐的相同的，愤怒与悲伤的魔法。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era la stessa magia dell'odio e della tristezza... che Beatrice aveva insegnato a Maria Onee-chan per vendicarsi del suo amico fatto a pezzi, Sakutarou.

Steam (ST): ...That same magic...that witch...had probably dwelled inside Aunt Rosa too.
Umineko Project (UP): ......That same magic, that witch, had surely dwelled inside Aunt Rosa too.
PC Japanese (JP): ……同じ魔法は、魔女は、きっと楼座叔母さんにも宿っていただろう。
Russian (RU): Такая же магия... Та ведьма наверняка присутствовала и внутри тёти Розы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......A mesma magia, aquela bruxa certamente residiu dentro da tia Rosa também.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……同樣的魔法、魔女，也一定宿在樓座姑母的身上吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……同样的魔法、魔女，也一定宿在楼座姑母的身上吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... La stessa magia... che quella strega... aveva infuso anche in Rosa oba-san.

Steam (ST): ......So I mustn't hate Ushiromiya Eva.
Umineko Project (UP): ............So I was wrong to hate Ushiromiya Eva.
PC Japanese (JP): …………だから、右代宮絵羽を憎んではいけなかったのだ。
Russian (RU): Поэтому я не должна ненавидеть Уширомию Еву.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ............Por isso, eu estava errada em odiar Ushiromiya Eva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …………所以，不可以去恨右代宮繪羽。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …………所以，不可以去恨右代宫绘羽。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quindi non dovrei odiare Ushiromiya Eva.

Steam (ST): ...Maybe... ...I should've become her ally, as the only person in the world who could understand her.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Perhaps.........I alone was supposed to have become her ally, the only person in the world who could understand her.
PC Japanese (JP): …ひょっとすると、………私だけは世界でただ一人理解して、味方になってあげなくてはいけなかったのだ。
Russian (RU): Скорее... я одна должна стать её союзницей, единственным человеком в мире, способным понять её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Possivelmente.........eu deveria ter me tornado aliada dela, a única pessoa no mundo que poderia entendê‐la.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …搞不好，………只有我是必須去當全世界唯一一個理解她的，站在她這一邊的伙伴的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …搞不好，………只有我是必须去当全世界唯一一个理解她的，站在她这一边的伙伴的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Magari... io sarei dovuta divenire sua alleata, la sola persona al mondo in grado di comprenderla.

Steam (ST): ...What did I say to her when I was young, when she returned alive all alone...?
Umineko Project (UP): ......What did I say to her when I was young, when she returned alive all alone...?
PC Japanese (JP): ……幼かった私は、たった一人生還した彼女に、どんな言葉を掛けたのだろう…？
Russian (RU): Что я сказала ей, вернувшейся совсем одной, когда была маленькой девочкой?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O que foi que eu disse a ela quando eu era jovem, quando ela voltou viva sozinha...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……幼年時的我，對獨自一人生還的她，說出了怎樣的話語呢…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……幼年时的我，对独自一人生还的她，说出了怎样的话语呢…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Cosa le dissi da piccola, quando tornò tutta sola...?

Steam (ST): Could it be... ...that I acted... ...as though she'd killed my family and returned on her own...?
Umineko Project (UP): Could it be.........that the way I acted towards her was.........as if she had come back by herself after killing all my family......?
PC Japanese (JP): ひょっとして、………まるで彼女が私の家族を殺し、一人だけ帰ってきたかのような、………そんな態度を、取ってしまったのではないだろうか……？
Russian (RU): Неужели я... повела себя так, словно она убила мою семью и вернулась одна?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Pode ser que.........a forma que eu agi diante dela.........tenha sido como se ela tivesse voltado sozinha depois de matar toda minha família......?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我會不會是採取了，………簡直就像是，她是殺了我的家人，獨自歸來的，………的那種態度呢……？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我会不会是采取了，………简直就像是，她是杀了我的家人，独自归来的，………的那种态度呢……？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non è che... ho assunto quell'atteggiamento... come se avesse ucciso la mia famiglia per poi tornare da sola...?

Steam (ST): ............ ...I can't believe it.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non ci posso credere.

Steam (ST): ...Aunt Eva, who has never been more than a object of and a synonym for hatred throughout my life, ......is turning into...a "human" I can understand...
Umineko Project (UP): ...Aunt Eva, who throughout my life has never been more than an object of and synonym for hatred, .........is turning into a...{i:human} who I can understand......
PC Japanese (JP): …私の人生において、憎悪の対象と代名詞でしかなかった絵羽伯母さんが、………理解できる「人間」に、…変わっていく……。
Russian (RU): Тётя Ева, прежде являвшаяся для меня предметом и синонимом ненависти на протяжении всей моей жизни... превращается... в {i:человека}, которого я могу понять...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...A tia Eva, que por toda minha vida nunca mais foi do que um objeto e sinônimo de ódio, .........está se transformando em um...{i:humano} na qual eu posso compreender......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …在我的人生中，只算得上是憎惡對象的代名詞的繪羽姑母，………逐漸變成了，能夠理解的，…「人類」……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …在我的人生中，只算得上是憎恶对象的代名词的绘羽姑母，………逐渐变成了，能够理解的，…「人类」……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Eva oba-san, che non era stata altro che un oggetto e un sinonimo di odio per tutta la mia vita... sta diventando... un ‘umano’ che posso comprendere...

Steam (ST): So, ......I can see, right next to Aunt Eva, ...the form of the black witch, who taught her the black magic...
Umineko Project (UP): And so. .........I looked right next to Aunt Eva, ......at the form of the black witch who taught her the black magic......
PC Japanese (JP): だから。………絵羽伯母さんのすぐ隣に、……彼女に黒き魔法を教えた、黒き魔女の姿を視る……。
Russian (RU): Таким образом, теперь я могу {y:1:‘видеть’}{n:1:видеть} рядом с тётей Евой... фигуру чёрной ведьмы, научившей её чёрной магии...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E então. .........Eu olhei diretamente para a tia Eva, ......para a forma daquela bruxa da escuridão, que havia ensinado magia negra para ela......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以。………去直視，就在繪羽姑母身旁，……教給她黑魔法的，黑魔女……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以。………去直视，就在绘羽姑母身旁，……教给她黑魔法的，黑魔女……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per cui. ... posso vedere, proprio al fianco di Eva oba-san... la sagoma della strega che le ha insegnato la magia nera...

Steam (ST): Aunt Eva...was crying.
Umineko Project (UP): Aunt Eva...was crying.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽伯母さんは、…泣いていた。
Russian (RU): Тётя Ева... плакала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A tia Eva...estava chorando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽姑母，…在哭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽姑母，…在哭。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Eva oba-san... stava piangendo.

Steam (ST): It was only natural.
Umineko Project (UP): It was only natural.
PC Japanese (JP): 無理もない。
Russian (RU): Это было совершенно естественно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era algo natural.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這也難免。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这也难免。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era normale.

Steam (ST): ......Not only was no one willing to understand the pain of losing her husband and son at once, ...but her only relative had insulted her, ...saying "Give me back my Dad and Mom".
Umineko Project (UP): .........Not only did she have no one who would understand her pain of having lost her husband and son all at once, ......but even I, her only relative, insulted her, ......saying "Give me back my mom and dad".
PC Japanese (JP): ………夫と息子を一度に亡くしたその悲しみを誰にも理解してもらえず、……唯一の親族である私にまで、お父さんとお母さんを返してと、……罵られたのだ。
Russian (RU): Рядом с ней не оказалось не только никого, кто способен был понять боль от потери сразу мужа и сына, но и единственная её родственница оскорбила её... заявив, "верни мне маму с папой".
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Além de não ter ninguém que entendesse sua dor por ter perdido seu marido e filho ao mesmo tempo, ......mas também eu, sua única parente, que a insultei, ......dizendo "Devolva meus pais".
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………丈夫與兒子同時亡故的悲傷，得不到任何人的理解，……就連身為她唯一的親人的我，都在喊著“把爸爸媽媽還給我”，……地罵她。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………丈夫与儿子同时亡故的悲伤，得不到任何人的理解，……就连身为她唯一的亲人的我，都在喊着“把爸爸妈妈还给我”，……地骂她。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non solo non aveva nessuno che potesse capire il dolore di perdere in una volta il figlio e il marito... ma la sua sola parente l'aveva insultata... dicendo ‘restituiscimi Mamma e Papà’.

Steam (ST): ......I can make the excuse that I was merciless because of my youth.
Umineko Project (UP): .........I can make the excuse that it was the mercilessness of youth.
PC Japanese (JP): ………私はそれを、幼さゆえの無慈悲だったと言い訳することも出来る。
Russian (RU): Мою беспощадность тогда можно оправдать малолетством.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Eu posso usar da desculpa que foi crueldade da juventude.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………我也能將此辯解為，因年幼而冷酷。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………我也能将此辩解为，因年幼而冷酷。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Posso essere stata abbastanza crudele a causa della mia giovinezza.

Steam (ST): ...However, ...to her at the time, it had probably been cruel enough to sever the last thread in her heart.
Umineko Project (UP): ...But......to her at the time, that was probably cruel enough to sever her heart's last thread.
PC Japanese (JP): …しかし、……あの時の彼女にそれは、最後の心の糸を断ち切るほどの、残酷さがあっただろう。
Russian (RU): Однако эти мои слова, наложившись на её горе и душевную боль, ножом обрезали последнюю ниточку, тянувшуюся к её сердцу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Mas......para ela, naquele momento, provavelmente foi cruel o bastante para cortar o último fio em seu coração.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …不過，……對那時的她來說，它是殘酷到了，剪斷了她的最後一根心弦吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …不过，……对那时的她来说，它是残酷到了，剪断了她的最后一根心弦吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Tuttavia... in quel momento, era stato abbastanza per strappare l'ultimo filamento del suo cuore.

Steam (ST): .........In the following days, the talk shows and magazines publicly slandered her.
Umineko Project (UP): ..................In the following days, the talk shows and magazines publicly slandered her.
PC Japanese (JP): ………………連日、ワイドショーや週刊誌が、彼女を公然と中傷した。
Russian (RU): В последующие дни ток‐шоу и журналы публично поносили, чернили и оговаривали её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ..................Nos dias seguintes, os talk shows e revistas publicaram mentiras sobre ela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………………每天都有八卦秀或周刊雜誌公然中傷她。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………………每天都有八卦秀或周刊杂志公然中伤她。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Nei giorni a seguire, i talk show e i giornali la attaccavano apertamente.

Steam (ST): The truth of her husband's business and character...and even her beloved son were negated.
Umineko Project (UP): The truths of her late husband's business and character, and even those about her beloved son, were denied.
PC Japanese (JP): 亡父の事業も人格も、最愛の息子のことまで、否定された。
Russian (RU): Правда о бизнесе и характере её мужа и даже её горячо любимого сына оказалась погребена под это напраслиной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As verdades sobre a personalidade e negócios de seu falecido marido, a até mesmo sobre seu amado filho, foram negadas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 連亡夫的事業人格，還有最愛的兒子，都遭到了否定。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 连亡夫的事业人格，还有最爱的儿子，都遭到了否定。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La verità sugli affari e sulla personalità di suo marito, e anche il suo amato figlio venivano negati.

Steam (ST): She no longer had anything left.
Umineko Project (UP): She no longer had anything left.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女には、もう、何も残らなかった。
Russian (RU): У неё больше никого и ничего не осталось.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela não tinha mais nada sobrando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她已經，什麼都不剩了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她已经，什么都不剩了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non aveva più nulla.

Steam (ST): She could do nothing but cry and howl, ...trying to forget the pain and sadness at least for a while.
Umineko Project (UP): She could do nothing but cry and howl, ......trying to forget the pain and sadness for just a few moments.
PC Japanese (JP): 痛みと悲しみを、わずかの間でも忘れるために、……泣きながら吼えるしかなかった。
Russian (RU): И потому она могла лишь выть да рыдать, пытаясь хоть ненадолго усмирить свои боль и печаль.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela não podia fazer mais nada além de chorar e gritar, ......tentando esquecer a dor e tristeza pro alguns instantes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 為了能，哪怕是在一小會兒時間裡，忘記痛與悲，……她只好邊哭邊吼。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 为了能，哪怕是在一小会儿时间里，忘记痛与悲，……她只好边哭边吼。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non poteva fare altro che piangere e urlare... cercando di dimenticare il dolore e la tristezza almeno per un attimo.

Steam (ST): After all, she could only feel a tiny bit of release, and only during the time that she howled.
Umineko Project (UP): Because only while howling could she feel the slightest bit of release.
PC Japanese (JP): 吼えている間だけは、わずかに解放されたからだ。
Russian (RU): Потому что её хоть ненадолго отпускало и только тогда, когда она выла.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porque, apenas quando gritava, ela podia sentir uma mínima libertação.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為只有在吼叫的那段時間裡，能得到一點點的解放。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为只有在吼叫的那段时间里，能得到一点点的解放。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perché poteva sentirsi libera per un attimo, e solo mentre urlava.

Steam (ST): And so, ......the black witch taught her how to howl.
Umineko Project (UP): And so, .........the black witch taught her how to howl.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、………黒き魔女が吼え方を教えた。
Russian (RU): И вот так, чёрная ведьма научила её, как следует выть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E então, .........a bruxa da escuridão a ensinou como rugir.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，………黑魔女教了她，怎麼吼。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，………黑魔女教了她，怎么吼。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Così... la strega nera le insegnò come urlare.

Steam (ST): The one I hated...was the black witch. Black magic can probably release one from that pain for an instant.
Umineko Project (UP): The one I hated...was the black witch. The black magic probably did release her from that suffering for just a short time.
PC Japanese (JP): 私が憎むのは、その黒き魔女。黒き魔法は、ひと時の間だけ、確かに苦しみから解放はしただろう。
Russian (RU): Той, которую я ненавидела, была чёрная ведьма. Чёрная магия могла, похоже, в один миг прогнать ту боль.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A única que eu odiava...era a bruxa da escuridão. A magia negra provavelmente liberou ela daquele sofrimento por um breve momento.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我憎恨的是，那位黑魔女。用黑魔法，的確能暫時地從苦楚中獲得解放吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我憎恨的是，那位黑魔女。用黑魔法，的确能暂时地从苦楚中获得解放吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Colei che odiavo... era la strega nera. La magia nera probabilmente poteva liberare in un attimo qualcuno dal dolore.

Steam (ST): ...However, it never lifts that weight from a person's shoulders.
Umineko Project (UP): ......However, it would never lift that weight from her shoulders.
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし。その重みを肩から下ろしてやることは決してない。
Russian (RU): Однако... Та тяжкая ноша так и оставалась на плечах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Porém, isso nunca levantaria o peso dos ombros dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……可是。它決不會卸下壓在肩上的重負。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……可是。它决不会卸下压在肩上的重负。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Tuttavia. Quel peso non sarebbe mai scomparso dalle spalle di qualcuno.

Steam (ST): On the contrary, it forces that weight onto further victims, ......filling the world with hatred.
Umineko Project (UP): To the contrary, it would force that weight on further victims, .........filling the world with the weight of hatred.
PC Japanese (JP): それどころか、その重みを次なる犠牲者にも強いて、………世界を憎しみの重みで、いっぱいにしてしまう。
Russian (RU): Наоборот, она будет перекладываться на плечи дальнейших жертв, наполняя мир грузом ненависти.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Pelo contrário, acabaria forçando o peso em novas vítimas, .........preenchendo o mundo com o peso do ódio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 豈止如此，它還會將這重負強加給下一個犧牲者，………令世界充滿凝重的恨。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 岂止如此，它还会将这重负强加给下一个牺牲者，………令世界充满凝重的恨。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Al contrario, sarebbe passato su di un'altra vittima... riempiendo il mondo con il peso dell'odio.

Steam (ST): ......If only Aunt Eva knew of white magic...and had a true witch nearby...
Umineko Project (UP): ...............If Aunt Eva was to have a true witch nearby, one who knew of white magic...
PC Japanese (JP): ……………もしも絵羽伯母さんに、白き魔法を知る、正しい魔女が近くにいてくれたなら。
Russian (RU): Если бы тётя Ева знала о белой магии и имела истинного друга рядом с ней...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...............Se a tia Eva tivesse uma bruxa de verdade próxima dela, uma que conhecesse a magia alva...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……………如果，繪羽姑母，有知曉白魔法的正道魔女在她附近的話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……………如果，绘羽姑母，有知晓白魔法的正道魔女在她附近的话。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Se solo Eva oba-san avesse conosciuto la magia Bianca, e avesse avuto vicino una vera strega...

Steam (ST): ...Shouldn't that... ...have been... ...me......?
PC Japanese (JP): ……それ、…………私のはずじゃ、……ないか………。
Russian (RU): Неужели таковым... полагалось стать... мне?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......esta............supostamente não seria......eu.........?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這個魔女，…………不就應該，……是我嗎………？
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这个魔女，…………不就应该，……是我吗………？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quella... non avrei dovuto essere... io...?

Steam (ST): Didn't I learn the magic to create happiness from Maria onee-chan?
Umineko Project (UP): I had learned the magic to create happiness from Maria onee‐chan.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は真里亞お姉ちゃんから、幸せにする魔法を習っていたはずなんだ。
Russian (RU): Разве не я выучилась магии счастья у Марии онее‐чан?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu aprendi a magia para criar a felicidade com a Maria onee‐chan.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我應該是從真里亞姐姐那學了令人變幸福的魔法啊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我应该是从真里亚姐姐那学了令人变幸福的魔法啊。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non ho imparato la magia per creare la felicità da Maria Onee-chan?

Steam (ST): ......If I'd taught her...with that magic, ......could we have... ...built a future with a completely different relationship?
Umineko Project (UP): .........If I could have saved her......with that magic, ...............might we not have.........built up a future with a completely different relationship?
PC Japanese (JP): ………その魔法で、……彼女を救えていたら、……………私たちは、まったく違う関係の未来を、……築けていたのではないか。
Russian (RU): Если бы я научила тётю Еву... той магии... мы смогли бы... сотворить будущее с совсем другими отношениями?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Se eu tivesse salvo ela......com essa magia, ...............talvez nós pudéssemos.........ter construído um futuro com uma relação completamente diferente?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………要是我以這魔法，……拯救了她的話，……………那我們之間不就已經築起了，……關係完全不同的未來了嘛？
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………要是我以这魔法，……拯救了她的话，……………那我们之间不就已经筑起了，……关系完全不同的未来了嘛？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Se gliel'avessi insegnata... con quella magia... avremmo potuto... costruire un futuro diverso con una relazione totalmente differente?

Steam (ST): Up until now, ......I've hated Aunt Eva constantly. ...So I didn't notice the black witch beside her.
Umineko Project (UP): All this time, .........I have hated Aunt Eva.{n}...So I never noticed the black witch beside her.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は今までずっと、………絵羽伯母さんを憎み続けてきた。…だから、その隣にいる、黒き魔女に、気付けなかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 私は今までずっと、………絵羽伯母さんを憎み続けてきた。{n}…だから、その隣にいる、黒き魔女に、気付けなかった。
Russian (RU): До сего момента я ненавидела тётю Еву.{n}Но я не заметила чёрную ведьму рядом с ней.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todo esse tempo, .........eu passei odiando a tia Eva.{n}...Por isso, nunca percebi que a bruxa da escuridão estava ao lado dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我迄今為止，………一直憎恨著繪羽姑母。{n}…所以，沒能發覺，就在她身旁的黑魔女。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我迄今为止，………一直憎恨着绘羽姑母。{n}…所以，没能发觉，就在她身旁的黑魔女。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Fin'ora... ho odiato Eva oba-san per tutto il tempo. ... E quindi non mi sono mai accorta della strega nera al suo fianco.

Steam (ST): ...Without love, it could not be "seen". I didn't... ...have any love for her...
Umineko Project (UP): ......Without love, it couldn't be {y:1:‘seen’}{n:1:seen}.{n}I didn't have......any love for her......
PC Japanese (JP): ……愛がなかったから、視えなかった。私は彼女に対し、……愛が、なかったのだ……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……愛がなかったから、視えなかった。{n}私は彼女に対し、……愛が、なかったのだ……。
Russian (RU): Тем, в ком нет любви, не дано {y:1:‘узреть’}{n:1:узреть} её.{n}Я... не любила её...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Sem amor, isto não pode ser {y:1:‘visto’}{n:1:visto}.{n}Eu não tinha......nenhum amor por ela......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……因為沒有愛，所以看不到。{n}我對她，……沒有，愛……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……因为没有爱，所以看不到。{n}我对她，……没有，爱……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Senza amore, non può essere visto. Io non... provavo amore per lei...

Steam (ST): So now, finally... ......I'll glare at the black witch, ...the one I truly should hate.
Umineko Project (UP): So now, finally............I'll glare at the black witch, ......the one I truly should hate.
PC Japanese (JP): だから今こそ。………本当に憎むべき魔女を、……睨む。
Russian (RU): И вот теперь, я, наконец‐то... Прожгу взглядом чёрную ведьму — ту самую, кого мне и следует ненавидеть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, agora, finalmente............eu irei olhar para a bruxa da escuridão, ......aquela que eu realmente deveria odiar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以在此刻。………我怒視，……我真正應當憎恨的魔女。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以在此刻。………我怒视，……我真正应当憎恨的魔女。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi ora, finalmente... guarderò la strega nera... colei che dovrei amare davvero.

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "...Oh. ......Whaat's this? You can "see" me? Hehheheheheh...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "......Oh? .........What's thiiis? You can {y:1:‘see’}{n:1:see} me? Ehheheheheh...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……あら。………なぁに。私のことが視えるの？　うっふふふふふ…！」
Russian (RU): "....О, что это тут у нас? Ты можешь меня {y:1:‘видеть’}{n:1:видеть}? Эхе‐хе‐хе‐хе!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Ora? .........O que é foiii? Você consegue me {y:1:‘ver’}{n:1:ver}? Ehheheheheh...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……啊呀？………怎麼？能看到我麼？嗚、哼哼哼哼哼…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……啊呀？………怎么？能看到我么？呜、哼哼哼哼哼…！」

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "Right? There's no way you can forgive her! Do it more! More of the flames of hatred! Nothing can warm you except the fires of hate. After being frozen in the snow fields of anger and sadness, the only flame that can warm you is hatred...!!

PC Japanese (JP): 「でしょう？　許せるわけがない！　もっとよ！　もっと憎悪の炎を！　憎しみの炎でしかあなたは暖を取れないの。怒りと悲しみの雪原で凍えるあなたを温められる炎は、憎しみだけなのよ…！！

Steam (ST): "Sumadera Kasumi, look at that bundle of flowers. ......These flowers are for your dead family, right, Ange?"

Steam (ST): The black witch grinned at me unpleasantly, using her chin to signal Kasumi to pick it up.
Umineko Project (UP): The black witch grinned at me unpleasantly, and used her chin to signal Kasumi to pick them up.
PC Japanese (JP): 黒き魔女は、ニヤリといやらしく私に笑うと、顎で霞にそれを拾えと指示する。
Russian (RU): Неприятно ухмыльнувшись мне, чёрная ведьма подбородком посигналила Касуми поднять букет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A bruxa da escuridão sorriu para mim de forma desagradável, e, com seu queixo, fez sinal para que Kasumi o pegasse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黑魔女朝我面目可憎地一笑，以下巴指示霞撿起花束。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黑魔女朝我面目可憎地一笑，以下巴指示霞捡起花束。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La strega nera sogghignò fastidiosamente, usando il mento per indicare a Kasumi di raccoglierlo.

Steam (ST): Kasumi picked up the flowers I was going to offer, ......brought them all the way over to me, dropped them, and made a show of trampling them...
Umineko Project (UP): Kasumi picked up the flowers I was going to offer, .........brought them all the way over to me, dropped them in front of me, and made a show of trampling them...
PC Japanese (JP): 霞は私が落とした手向けの花束を拾い、………わざわざ持ってきて、私の前に落とし、これ見よがしに踏み躙ってみせる…。
Russian (RU): Та подняла цветы, которые я собиралась возложить, поднесла их ко мне, швырнула на землю и, стараясь, чтобы это выглядело как можно зрелищней, растоптала их.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kasumi pegou as flores que eu ia oferecer, .........as trouxe até mim, as jogou no chão em minha frente, e as pisoteou, ostentando‐se...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霞撿起我剛才脫手掉下的供奉的花束，………故意拿到我面前，將之扔下，就如是做給我看一般踐踏了起來…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 霞捡起我刚才脱手掉下的供奉的花束，………故意拿到我面前，将之扔下，就如是做给我看一般践踏了起来…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kasumi raccolse i fiori che stavo per offrire... me li portò, li lasciò cadere, e diede spettacolo mentre li calpestava...

Steam (ST): Her expression was filled with hatred...and a frantic quality that couldn't be explained with hatred alone.
Umineko Project (UP): Her expression was filled with hatred, ......and a frantic quality that simple hatred couldn't explain.
PC Japanese (JP): その表情は、憎しみと、……それだけでは説明できない、必死な形相でいっぱいだった。
Russian (RU): Лицо её было искажено гримасой ненависти, однако было в нём и ещё что‐то, не объяснимое одной лишь ненавистью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sua face estava repleta de ódio, ......uma frenética expressão que o simples ódio não poderia explicar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她的表情中，……充滿了無法光以憎恨來解釋的，拼上老命的勁頭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她的表情中，……充满了无法光以憎恨来解释的，拼上老命的劲头。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sua espressione era piena d'odio... e un sentimento frenetico che non poteva essere spiegato semplicemente con l'odio.

Steam (ST): ...She trampled them over and over again as though her sadness was reaching the bursting point.
Umineko Project (UP): ...It was as if trampling them over and over again was the only way to prevent the sadness inside her from reaching the bursting point.
PC Japanese (JP): …それを何度も踏み躙らねば、自分の悲しみがこみ上げて来てしまうとでも言わんばかりに。
Russian (RU): То, как она раз за разом топала по цветам, словно её печаль приблизилась к точке кипения.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Era como se ficar pulando nelas era a única forma de prevenir que a tristeza dentro dela chegasse ao ponto de explodir.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …簡直就差沒說“若不這麼一腳一腳地踐踏，自己的悲傷就會涌上心頭”了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …简直就差没说“若不这么一脚一脚地践踏，自己的悲伤就会涌上心头”了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il modo in cui li schiacciava più e più volte era come se la tristezza in lei stesse raggiungendo il punto di rottura.

Steam (ST): So the sound of her trampling it was just sad.
Umineko Project (UP): So the sound of her trampling was downright sad.
PC Japanese (JP): だから踏み躙るその音が、ただただ悲しかった。
Russian (RU): Поэтому её топот просто вызывал грусть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso o som dela pisoteando era completamente triste.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以這一腳腳踏下的聲音，僅僅令人感到可悲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以这一脚脚踏下的声音，仅仅令人感到可悲。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Così il suono di lei che li calpestava era solo triste.

Speaker: {f:5:Eva Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "See? This book's really important to Ange, right? Gotta belittle the things that are important to her, okay? That'll work better than punching or kicking for a girl like her. ...You know that better than anyone, don't you...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "See? See how important this book is to Ange? Mock the things that are important to her. That works better than punching or kicking for a girl like her. ......You know that better than anyone, right...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ほらね？　この本は縁寿にとっての大切なものでしょう？　大切なものを貶してやりなさい？　こういう子には、殴る蹴るよりもそっちの方が効くんだから。……あなたがそれを、一番よく知っているでしょう…？」
Russian (RU): "Видишь? Эта книга очень важна для Энджи, верно? Глумись над вещами, что дороги ей, сечёшь? Это подействует на неё даже лучше, чем затрещины и пинки. .....Ты знаешь это лучше всех, верно?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Viu? Viu como esse livro é importante para a Ange? Menospreze as coisas importantes para ela, certo? Para uma garota como ela, isso tem muito mais efeito do que chutes e socos. ......Você sabe disso melhor do que ninguém, não sabe...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「瞧瞧瞧？這書對緣壽來說是很重要的東西吧？就來痛貶下她所看重的東西吧？對付這種孩子，比起拳打腳踢，還是這法子更有效哦。……你自己就最清楚這一點吧…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「瞧瞧瞧？这书对缘寿来说是很重要的东西吧？就来痛贬下她所看重的东西吧？对付这种孩子，比起拳打脚踢，还是这法子更有效哦。……你自己就最清楚这一点吧…？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Visto? Questo libro è davvero importante per Ange, giusto? Ridicolizza le cose che sono importanti per lei, d'accordo? Questo funzionerà meglio di calci e pugni su una ragazza come lei. ... Tu lo sai meglio di chiunque, vero...?"

Steam (ST): As though remembering something painful, Kasumi's face twisted for an instant.
